I have woke up dreaming about them, or was it communication?  I never felt unsafe. Kind of scared of the unknown but not unsafe.This book was like a guild book to our Yetis.  Hopefully you can have an open mind when you read it.  It makes more sense to me than anything I have read or heard.  And yes, the idea of killing one to prove they are real is horrible.  Being part of UFO activity also makes more sense.  They are more advanced than us.  Different in many ways.  Interesting.  NO ONE has put this viewpoint together and I do appreciate the work and the other way of seeing this.  NOW its making more sense.  Well done!  Bravo!

What I got were velcro closing, fit like a glove to the paddle.  They cushion fantastic and help with blisters. I do wear gloves but sometimes that still isn't enough, so this is a very nice addition to strong paddling.That said, the problem I have with them is that I find my hand position changes on the paddle. Who knew.  These grips then are in the way and no longer positioned where I need them. They won't just slide so I had to un-velcro them and then reposition, then when the hand position changes, there you go again. That is the reason for the one star down. I was fussing with them way too much. Yet, I like the cushion.  I am wondering if I add a second pair to cover a larger area if that might help. The size of the cushions are perfect for most any hand size but not if you change your hand position.
Cheap price and fits a CD case end perfectly.  It sticks very well. Doesn't peel off as some can.  The price is great for the amount you get!

These are adorable, sassy looking boots.  I use them for motorcycle riding.  The tip of the toe has a darker stain which looks out of place/odd. That is why the one star down.  It doesn't look right, but not all that bad for the price. I think they fit as expected. I wear a 9 and ordered a 9 and I find it plenty roomy and comfortable.  I can spend the day standing or walking just fine in these boots. No rubbing anyplace. I think they are a great boot for the price!!
They work fine and aren't uncomfortable but you have to be a contortionist to get them in place.  You really need  a second person helping.  I think I will go to the sports bra instead.

Besides the fact it is an awesome purple I use my kindle in the car a lot.  I have it read books to me while I am driving longer distances.  Since I live in Wisconsin that is pretty much everyplace!  I was using the the charge to my phone because it fit BUT oh man, it over heated my kindle and then it shut down. I was so worried it fried my battery.  It recovered but I didn't want to risk that again so I got this.  Phew... it keeps it charged and no over heating.  I have the kindle fire HD.  Since we aren't born knowing what cords work with what I do wish they included the necessary cords with the purchase of the kindle!!Good Cord for the job!

I had tried Ecoquest purifier and loved how it worked but zero of their products lasted very long at all and cost three times as much. This is very similar.  Looks to be built better.  I LOVE the job it does.  I am currently using this in the basement because in spite of using a dehumidifier there is a musty smell.  I am asthmatic and have had a terrible time getting it in control.  My major allergy in testing was to molds. Well, yeah, especially if there is constant exposure to it.  A normal air purifier with just a hepa filter isn't going to touch it.  I bought this.  I wanted the ozone technology and the different way it purifies the air because it WORKS.  I keep my cleaning supplies on shelves that are in the basement stairs. (yes very old victorian house)  Every time I open the door it just smells fresh now.  Thank you thank you.  My asthma has taken a real turn around.  I rarely need an inhaler now where before I was using it all day (yes I know I shouldn't).I appreciate that the price is 1/3 of what Ecoquest was.  If you use this in your living area space  you don't even need the extra ozone feature. It does smell like 'swimming pool' when you use it.  It is said to sanitize all areas so it could have its uses in a bathroom or kitchen area.  I find that just is normal air purifier mode is magic.I will buy more.  Handling the basement is a huge project but its not a problem at all for this machine. I had the ecoquest in the kitchen and it kept the kitchen smells to a zero.  I loved that.  I will buy another MicroLux to put in the kitchen.The size was not a shock to me because it was the same as the other one I had but I don't find it to be that big or heavy.  Its all relative I guess. It is about a foot tall but that fits anyplace.I can't recommend this enough.  Proof positive to me how much my asthma has improved and this is all I did different.  I will no longer live without this machine!

I have a synthetic type bathroom countertop/sink in one.  It is black with marble type white streaks through it. It is also  years old.  The scratches and bangs are wear was really showing.  I rubbed Perfect Sink on the counter like you would a car wax. Circular rub it in, let it dry, buff it off.  I did that twice. Wow, the scratches are gone except for deeper ones in the sink. My sink shines like I haven't seen it do before!  I absolutely love it.  This is similar to any car rubbing compound. Leaves a wonderful shine. I just love this product and glad I stumbled upon it!!  Now I will keep the buffing and shine up as needed.  Water spots aren't the issue they were either. The shine has stayed (a month now).  Very, very happy!!

Thanks to another review I ordered bigger. They do run small.  I normally wear a 8 1/2 to a 9 and I ordered a 10.  Tens fit perfect!  I am very impressed with the looks of the book. They are comfortable.  As long as you order big you will be fine. I love these boots!If you ride your own motorcycle and have a heel toe shifter the heel is flat enough to not miss the peg with the heel.

I was afraid with the tinting the light would be too dull or off color. I'm  using it in the bathroom by the sink so true lighting would be nice!  Its plenty bright (60w) and all the tinting seems to do is take the harshness off the brightness.  It doesn't really interfere with make up, hair color etc.  Its just a lovely soft light that looks really cool!  I use it with a clear dome light (Nuvo Lighting 60/5514 Vintage Incandescent One Light Wall Sconce Cone Clear Glass Rustic Bronze).  Since we have an old victorian house this fits the look perfectly. I"m glad they came out with these.  It is advertised to last over 5000 hours!!The light came with a bulb light this but clear and 40w.  The look is still good in a clear but this is nicer in appearance if you are going for 'old' and want a softer light.

Facial and body scrubs that contain plastic micro-beads are disrupting our ecosystem. The plastic beads, when washed down our drains, are polluting our oceans and waterways. What's even more alarming is that because the plastic beads are not biodegradable, toxic chemical pollutants floating in our oceans, attach to the beads. Many fish and sea creatures mistake these poisonous pollution clusters as food! And most of us consume fish once to twice a week. Yikes! Though the legislature is passing a bill to ban the use of micro-beads in cosmetic products - the bill won't be enforced until 2119!! This is truly alarming. What should we do? Choose scrubs that offer natural, earth-friendly ingredients such as sea salt, volcanic sand or crushed nuts. And reduce fish consumption.One of the best natural scrubs recommended is baking soda. Just apply a small handful on wet, clean skin and rub in a gentle circular motion.(hollywoodbeautysecrets.com)*** For the very best face cream that tightens skin is actually virgin coconut oil. I don't use the processed. Very little is needed and it sinks in nicely. In a few weeks you will really notice a difference.  Great hair conditioner too.  I use nothing else and I have seen lines reverse big time. I look far younger than I am.  Arm area is smoother too.

These absolutely make a difference!!  I see an extreme difference in my produce. Where I see it the most is in the container I keep my washed and cut spinach and broccoli/cauliflower.  Those are plastic bins with vents which are to be extenders for produce and they do a nice job. But when I place a piece of this on the bottom, wow!  After a week my spinach looks new.  Zero wilting.  Amazing.As for produce in the bin, yes, absolutely I see a difference. I like the green bags. I see a difference with those.  I have to think this is a special material like the green bags, just guessing on that one.  They are cheap, save you tons.  We live in an extremely remote area so getting groceries is a day trip so we buy for at least the week, hopefully two.  You can see this can be an issue on keeping things fresh.  This was the final magic trick!

I eat a LOT of spinach salads.  I use the green  bags which do help vs a regular bag but this... this is far above and beyond the bags for keeping spinach/lettuce or anything fresh. the vent can be open or close. I also leave the bottom off for spinach/lettuce to vent even more to keep the spinach dry.  After a week there is zero wilting.  I just love this. I was afraid it would be just one more gadget and take up too much room.  It saved me money big time on keep things fresh and for a long time.  I tend to buy more groceries because we live in a rural area and getting anything is a long drive. This has saved the day on keeping groceries fresh and saving gas!!

While someone stated it was beginners I disagree. I was taught to do the very thing she said not to in this book which makes tons of sense the way she explains it.  It is about an hour read at best.  Chapters 8-12 are all examples of what will work for each category.  For that I am very grateful.  It sure makes life a lot easier.  Just reading though them I could feel the difference.For two weeks now I have used the affirmations for body image and self-confidence. Wow, yes.  Now THAT made a huge difference in how I see myself.  I was raised with the constant drip of insults and being told that no one could possible love me and how fat I was (thought I wasnt) so I had a warped sense of what my self-image was.  In two weeks I am seeing things much differently!Affirmations work!  The book is great.  Its price is super.  What can you lose! Go for it!Table of Contents:1. The purpose of Affirmations2. How to create effective Affirmations3. How to Tell if an Affirmations Will Work4. How Often to Recite Affirmations5. The Best Way to Recite Affirmations6. Common Challenges in Using Affirmations7. Conclusion: Use Affirmations With Care8. Affirmation examples: For the physical body, (weight loss, anti-aging, weight gain, healthy hair and nails, exercise, health)9. Affirmations for Wealth & Success (Money, career, success, abundance)10. Affirmations for Love and Relationships (Love, Friendship, Romance, Family, Parent/Children, Marriage)11. Affirmations for self-image (Self-esteem, confidence, strength, wisdom, attitude, memory)  `12. Affirmations for Peace and Harmony (Forgiveness, Happiness, Faith, Peace, Safety, Trust, Life)You can let your kindle read the list to you several times a day too!

I have tried a bazillion shampoos.  This is THE ONE that works. I had three dime/quarter size psoriasis spots that were annoying beyond belief.  I had steroid shots in my scalp.  They worked for awhile then stopped. All other shampoos worked for awhile, maybe a week, then stopped.  This one I have used over a year now and this is what works.Word of caution if you color your hair... it will lighten your hair color.Save money and hair color: I just dab some shampoo on the spots, use that AWESOME scrubby brush that comes with it and rub the shampoo in the spots. I let it sit on my scalp while I brush my teeth first giving this a few minutes to sit there and do its thing. Then I jump in the shower, wet my hair and scrub (with the AWESOME brush) I do lather my whole head and let is set a little  time while in the shower but I use to let the shampoo be the last thing I did so it sat longer.  Saving color, I don't let it sit so long on my hair.  Its not a huge issue but it will lighten your hair over time.My hair is soft, not dry.  Other shampoos (especially prescription!) turned my hair into straw!  Not Nizoral.  Great stuff!!  Worth every penny.PS:  Scalp issues is an indication of something not in balance inside. Not eating wheat really helped me clear this up and...acupuncture. I swear by acupuncture!!!  It will fix a bunch of things at the same time.

What I love about this grinder is you set it to the type grind you want.  Hit go and it shuts off when it has reached that grind you selected.  With the hand held buttons I usually over ground, this makes it much more fool proof.I also love that the bottom pulls down, you can wind the cord up and put the bottom back and it is nice and neat in the cupboard!It has a slot where a brush to clean out the extras go. It is nice to have it always with the machine. It does tend to fall off however. I can't say I care. I just snap it back when I'm done using it.Super choice for a coffee grinder!
Now if this app didn't put me in my 'way back machine'.  Wow. How fun. All the 'real' cartoon favorites.  They are all clear, run well, tons of them.  Yippee, made me happy.

I live in tornado country so knowing what the radar says is extremely helpful!  This is the fastest way I can check a radar reading. I can zoom in or out without this app hanging up or freezing the screen.  You can zoom out and twirl to see the entire world if you want to or zoom in as close as you want.  Love this app and am very grateful for it!!

This are not an overpowering taste.  I add it to anything, my smoothies, over salads or as someone else said...on popcorn. Great idea that one was! It can be cheesy flavor on popcorn or salads.  it gives a real boost in energy but not hyper and has made a noticeable difference in my weight loss efforts (also include MCT Oil!!  That is also a real boost)Things I have noticed taking the Nutritional Yeast Flakes:* Energy boost* Holy crap does my hair and nails grow!!!* I'm more relaxed!* I am sleeping better than I have in a very long timeI came across this recipe on MindBodyGreen.com sometime ago and I just LOVE this recipe!!Heres one of the easiest recipes in the world and itll wow your dinner guests as well.1 head cauliflower1T olive oil1t black sesame seeds1/4c nutritional yeastPreheat your oven to 350.Take all the ingredients and drop them in a mixing bowl.Toss it with your hands until all is coated.Spread on a cooking sheet with parchment paper or foil and cook for about 20-25 minutes.Cauliflower should be a golden light brown. THATS IT!Popcorn:  (by the way popcorn is not GMO as regular corn is. Not yet anyway!)Nutritional Yeast PopcornIngredients cup popcorn kernels2 tbsp. coconut oil1 tbsp. nutritional yeastI use Himalayan salt, Plenty of it.  It doesn't mess with blood pressure btw (wheat does more than salt!)I also use the "Stir Crazy" popcorn popper.  LOVE that popper!Once the popcorn is popped we put it in a paper bag and put the N yeast and salt it with the popcorn and shake the bag around to mix well.  Neat trick.

This is a great price for MCT oil. Love the 2 pack. Now company IS pharmaceutical grade same as others promote.I am a huge fan of regular virgin coconut oil which is suppose to help with thyroid and weight loss. I used about three tablespoons a day as recommended.  While I have seen a difference in my skin and  hair I haven't seen huge differences in weight loss as I have with the MCT oil.My first week I have lost a pound a day and now second week I am losing at least a pound every other day. And.. I'm 60.  For two decades I haven't been able to budge my weight no matter what I tried.Here is what I am doing.I have three recommendationsOne: Standard Process Purification and Weight Loss Kit (available here on Amazon) There are a lot of pills in there and it may seem pricey but it works like nothing else has.Two: go see Dr Eric Berg videos on youtube.  He is a wealth of info and also has great products. Dr Berg talks about purification/detox as well.  He said that you have to get well FIRST and then you loose weight, not the other way around.  I found that to be true as well.  Once you cleanse your liver the weight starts to come off.  You may see no results for awhile even months but then all of a sudden it starts coming off.  Depending on what your health was. Have patience. Really keep on doing and eating the right things and it will come off.Three:  Use three tablespoons of MCT oil a day.  I split it up throughout the day.  I can honestly say I have done the same routine with and without the MCT oil and the oil has absolutely made a difference. I was using straight coconut oil in my shake or cooking my eggs in it (well still do that, its so yummy!)AM: Omelet; loaded with goodies such as mushrooms, onions, tomatoes, spinach. (not much cheese right now if any)or have a boiled egg. I have boiled eggs around at all times for my fast food.AM snack:  A Shake.  I use Standard Process shake OR Dr Eric Berg shake (wonderful and chocolate, LOADED with nutrition)In this shake I used the MCT Oil about on tablespoonLunch:  Small chicken salad, loaded again with goodies.  Use a light dressing!  You can use 1 tablespoon on your salad if you want.PM afternoon snack say around 3 or 4pm:  A shake, with two tablespoons MCT OIL.  (or save to put on salads)PM Dinner:  I eat about the palm of my hand size meat. I eat chicken and fish a lot.  Some steak. I am not as big on beef myself.  With that I steam broccoli and cauliflower and eat mounds of it. Dr Berg recommendations is to eat 8 cups of veggies a day. More cruciferous type veggies.  More above ground veggies vs below ground ( such as potatoes)Before bed: This one is just me. They say don't eat 3-4 hours before you go to bed but I sleep better if I do eat something. I usually make it a boiled egg. Something simple.I eat about 3 apples a day (helps clear the liver)There you have it.  It is actually a LOT of food and you aren't hungry and I really don't miss anything.  THE BIGGEST KEY IS TO STAY AWAY FROM WHEAT AND OTHER GRAIN.  Period.  Don't do it. I no longer miss bread and I use to grind my own wheat and make my own bread every week. Talk about missing something. I don't miss it.  My asthma is WAY better, no pain in my body, my skin (eczema) has clear completely up. Read WHEAT BELLY.  Wheat Belly: Lose the Wheat, Lose the Weight, and Find Your Path Back to Health by William DavisThe book will scare you straight.  Makes sense and I am living proof it matters.  Who knew wheat is GMO and we can't digest it!Other thoughts...as said MCT oil made a difference.  It is tasteless which helps a lot in using it wherever you want to. It boosts your metabolism.  How do I know.. because it makes me feel 'hotter'. I have no problem with getting the runs as someone was worried about but I think that is because I spread out the times I use it.  Using it before bedtime didn't really keep me awake but it did keep me too hot to sleep.  Its not like you will walk around sweating but  you are warmer.  In air conditioning or cooler days you won't really notice.Increase your B Vitamin intake.  That helped with energy and fat metabolism too. I used Nutritional yeast and put it in my shakes. Now Foods Nutritional Yeast Flakes (here in Amazon)  This is not a requirement but one more thing that gives a boost.The Standard Process products are top shelf.  There are a LOT of pills to take. But for once it mattered and I am dropping weight where I haven't been in over two decades as I said.  If you want to avoid the cost start with just the MCT oil and eating as suggested.  Be sure to eat plenty of food. Less is not helpful at all.  I noticed by eating something about ever three hours I loose much faster!!I have lost an average of 10 lbs in two weeks and I'm still loosing effortlessly between one half to a pound a day.Exercise?  If I can.  I haven't much because of asthma and being seriously out of shape for so long (being sick).  I have tried to ride my bicycle some or walk.  I love the Sunpentown Healthy Swing Machine with Swivel Disc by Sunpentown (here on Amazon $93 currently)  See youtube video on that one.  For those who can't exercise much this works wonders. The down side to the swing machine is it doesn't get your heart rate up or your lungs ( a plus in my case) but I do need to exercise my heart! So it can't be the everything.  It is considered a 'passive aerobic' exercise.  "Aerobic means -With oxygen" which does help to burn fat.  You can feel the tingle when you stop. Cool beans!Best of luck! I will stay on MCT oil forever.  Triple the coconut oil benefits?  Can you get better than that!

My skin is glowing.Weight loss: Well,deep breath here it goes....I started the HCG diet. I was another that read the book nonstop to the end.  I know for many abused children this is their 'normal'.  On some level you know that this is very wrong BUT it is 'your normal'.  If you are locked in a closet and told one and one is three and others will be wrong and tell you its two....then you learn that two and two is three. The part I am impressed with is that she could see past that 'normal' and be strong enough at a young age to stop. Stop the madness for your life and even more amazing is what you did with your life from there.  The story changes you.  There are still many that still think their abnormal like is their fate and there is nothing to do but keep trying to find love from mom/dad.  Or to keep getting in the situations that try to heal it from the outside such as failed relationships after another. Sarahs story is an eye opener.  There are too many closed doors that people don't want to see.  Thank you for making us look at the hard stuff and for those who need to step out of the madness can draw on your story to do so.  Especially the part where you went back to see your mother.  We feel obligated and that ray of hope that things will be different.  You did very well. I'm sure many lives have been changed thanks to this author. Note to author: Thank you Sarah for sharing the hard stuff. You are sooo beautiful in so many ways. I am very proud of you.  I do hope you have a ton of love and happiness!  [[Hugs]]
I used it for a pedometer I didn't want to loose that I was forever losing!  Problem solved.  Simple and easy and cheap.
It was mostly ads for cruises and vacations but nothing local as it said. I was thinking it would be more like Varage Sale is but not even close.

I used clean sweep before and it helped but not as good as this one does.  It cleans off MUCH more and quicker.  Got a lot of junk off my phone and back to working smoothly again. Works on  the kindle too!!

I got these for the fun of it.  They aren't bad. You turn over the pictures and then turn squares to make matches of pictures.  What lines up is for you and tells a 'fortune'.  If it is not for you and happened to line up it says that.  Disregard, that isn't for you!  It has actually matched my moods and happenings every time!  I just think they are fun to put together.

I bought the spleen support because acupuncture was treating that.  Its not like you 'know' your spleen is off!  The boost was outstanding.  I have used other SP products and the extra cost is worth it!  I would rather pay more for something that really works and makes a difference than pay less for something that is processed and doesn't.  Five stars from me.

I bought this for my car. It is a firmer memory foam and thicker than I thought it would be but works like a charm. I holds its shape over time and isn't too bulky for a car seat. It squishes just how you need it to do!!  Five stars from me!  I just wish it had different colors.

I am a Lavilin fan big time.  I use the cream. I did think a roll on would be nicer.  I down graded it one star because I hate the fragrance. Its very strong and I can smell it all day. Ack.  The cream is fragrance free. It works like Lavilin cream does so it gets four stars for that.  You can go days without having to repeat application.  I use it Sunday and again Thursday. Sweaty hot days, swimming, showering...all doesn't seem to matter as far as effectiveness.  The more you use it the less you need to. Bazar but it works! And its natural!  I don't know about the fragrance with the roll on however.

My car has two charger shots.  Not enough.  Not going to do it!  GPS and Phone and they are done. I take a lot of longer trips so I also charge my kindle, and let it read to me while on the road.  I charge a headset. This also has two USB slots.  It sits perfectly in one of the cup holders which for me, I'm alone most of the time, no problem. I love it.  It charges this back out of the way and everything doesn't have to be riding in front charging. Nice. Great invention!

You don't see these consoles much anymore. They usually come built in. My husband has a F150 truck/ stick.  Whatever we seemed to try made it uncomfortable to shift.  This has a nice slant to it making a stick no problem.  It has a padded top, also comfy. Room for two cups/adjustable! and plenty of room inside for the necessary 'stuff'.  It is slotted for CDs.  Well made. Very happy with it.

I have a small closet. This is a simple solution!  Make sure your top rod is braced for a lot of weight. There is no installation. If you can hang up a hanger you can 'install' this.  The  bottom rack is where I hang my pants. They slide nicely on the rod. The length is adjustable to your needs. Its a simple solution to a great need!!

This is not an overpowering vanilla.  Its smooth and absolutely delicious.  I add it a lot to a protein powder smoothie that is pretty tasteless so mostly I use this in a non baked item. Adding this vanilla makes tasteless turn to gourmet.  Its a very nice vanilla.  Because this is an extract/ alcohol based vanilla add the amount suggest in the recipe.  Note that it does state that this is gluten free and contains organic alcohol.

I love this purifier! This one really works!!  If you hold it close to your nose it smells like a swimming pool/clean air.  Its pretty powerful yet silent.  To me/asthmatic, it feels like oxygen.  I can't do the smelly car fragrances. This just keeps the air clean and easy to breath!!

My friend that is an outstanding Tarot reader recommended this app.  For the fun of it I downloaded it.  I am astounded by this app. It is second to none!  If you are looking for similar apps, stop right here with this one.  There is a card of the day and settings for major acura cards only if that is what you like.  The graphics are outstanding.  You can shuffle, cut the deck, pick your cards or let the app pick for you which... works just as well to be honest.  I am really impressed!

It was said that this has no depth but I have to disagree.  I looked up first and second names and they fit like gloves. Amazing! My friend is a life coach and uses this book for her clients.  She also makes gifts for her friends using this book and the meaning of names.  Super book. You can better understand a person by this book.
The earpiece squishes to fit your ear like ear plugs do. They are ok but not super comfortable or secure.  Not bad, not great. The sound is pretty good.  For the price they work.

The glasses arrived broken.  Not judging them on just that they seemed very poorly made/flimsy. I can't say how the fit is, seemed a wide fit. Customer service was great. No questions on a return/refund.

This book is an easy read and I really appreciate the new view of Michael Jackson.  The book talks about the different ways he viewed the world to put into his dance.  This is far less of a review of his life than how he was a success.  I know I have sat and watched people at trade shows to see why a person went into this booth and not that one. Why did this one have a crowd and that booth didn't.  Michael did that with everything he did.  What excites people, what movement of that animal or person can he use in his performance.  Loved the book. You don't have to be a Michael fan to really appreciate this book.  I like how he thought.  I'm impressed.
I LOVE these hangers.  I have a second rod for just pants and they look so neat and easy to hang.  Bottomline, nicely balanced hanger with plastic grip so the plants don't crease or slide.

I love my coffee.  I like it strong, smooth, bold flavor and organic.  This has sort of an acid taste to it.  Not bold flavor, more mild I would say.  It isn't a 'bad' coffee but I don't think its an outstanding coffee either.

I had purchased large stickers for a keyboard in the past and they were LARGE...these I would say more Medium size.  They were ok, but not large enough for what we needed.  The yellow color vs white helps people with macular degeneration see better however.

This robe is light weight (about three pounds).  I purchased it for my 85 year old aunt who needs a robe to dry off instead of so much towel action.  The weight was important because she had trouble lifting a heavier robe to hang it up. This is light weight, absorbent, good for all year around.  The size runs pretty true.  Not a bad terry cloth. Some can be scratch but this is soft. Five stars from me.

How smart and how simple.  Whoever invented this rocks!  There is no good solution as to how to store bags. I am a bag-a-holic.  I admit it. I am also a neat nick. I love everything in its place. This is it.  I have tried shoe holders and putting them on hangers. THIS is the final solution!First the straps on the door hook from the top to the bottom of the door.  If your door is an odd thickness, or too thin they suggest a sticky hook.  There is an o-ring on the top and bottom of a twill tape which is also adjustable.  Having the strap pulled tight from top to bottom there are 'hooks' that you can slide to the place you want.  For long handle bags I just place a shorter bag on the top. It is NOT just for short handle bags. It is so simple, no tools or super powers needed.

WHAT do you do with all those bags?  This is my final solution!  It looks classy, it is secure to the wall even with the pulling and tugging on it.  It adheres with screws and VERY sticky tape.  When its full, you honestly don't need more bags!  I decided this is going with the house because that tape is going nowhere!

I was traveling and forgot my shampoo. Yes, I looked in the cupboards of my host!!  (so ashamed).  Worse yet, all I could find was the dogs shampoo.  Hey in desperate times you have to do what you have to do so I used the dogs shampoo!!  OMG my scalp was fantastic.  I owe them a bottle. I'm not letting it go. I love this stuff. If you have scalp issues this works great for clearing it up and keeping it clear.Oh, and the dog itches less too.Another recommendation for people shampoo: Nizoral A-D Anti-Dandruff Shampoo . That is also amazing stuff. It will lighten your color if you color your hair.  Just an FYI but it does not dry your hair out like a lot of the dandruff shampoos can.

I take a roast, cook it, slice it up, make gravy (package will work fine) and I add about half a bottle to a whole roast. Recook in a crock pot. It will melt in your mouth and the flavor is amazing.  It is my 'secret' ingredient.  It adds SO much flavor!  I also use it with chicken, in a stew etc.  Love it!! I was happy to see it in larger sizes!

I got these for my aunt that can hardly see.  I had purchased some in the past for my father and they were very large and easy to see. I would say these are 'medium' size but not really large like I had hoped.  It would depend on how bad the eyesight is you are catering to. Doing this really helps a lot!  In my case I was really hoping for larger!

I take a roast, cook it, slice it up, make gravy (package will work fine) and I add about half a bottle to a whole roast. Recook in a crock pot. It will melt in your mouth and the flavor is amazing.  It is my 'secret' ingredient.  It adds SO much flavor!  I also use it with chicken, in a stew etc.  Love it!! I was happy to see it in larger sizes!
I love it. It is well made meaning that the handle vs spoon part is balanced. Doesn't feel cheap, nicely made. Does the job.

I am giving two stars because I think it is, or could be, a handy magnifier.  This was for macular degeneration where an 8x is really needed but it is hard to find.  The 8x part is so small it is useless.  You can magnify one letter (not word) letter, at a time. That is just too painful. As for the 4x, not bad, like the light and the case and the neckstrap of you need to have it handy all the time as in my aunts case.  I just give it an 'ok'.

Our couch has three legs in the front, two on the back and worked like a charm.  This is being used for an 84 year old using a walker that is impossible to get up from a short/normal couch. I have to say it is far easier to get up from.  The first reactions is it looks funny (square looks better than the round ones for a couch where it shows, in my opinion) The couch is very stable, she is in heaven to be able to take her nap on the couch again!  Its the little things!As for a chair, four legs, it tipped over (luckily with just me).  We will need a plan B on that one.They are sturdy, well made. I thought kind of pricey but it does the job without building something.

Instructions are to put two coats on your natural nails if using alone.  If using with polish, put one coat on your nails, color, then use almost gel as your top coat. You are to repeat every three days.  Follow the instructions depending if I want clear or color however I don't really need to remove my color every three days. I just put more top coat on. My nails grow fast (also with the help of Great Lakes Gelatin powder)Great Lakes Gelatin, Collagen Hydrolysate (Kosher) 16-Ounce, packaged as individuals.  The gelatin helps to build nice strong nails that grow rather quickly.  The Almost Gel does harden the nails so even if you catch your nail it seems better protected and doesn't split.  I think it is great stuff!  I will keep it in my arsenal!

I bought these while traveling and didn't want to have the bottle of remover and cotton etc while traveling. These are beyond perfect for travel! They are thick, hold plenty of remover but not drippy at all.  They are just perfect.  With a quick wipe on the nail the polish is off. I repainted my nails (natural nails) and had plenty of moisture for the touch ups. I will keep these on hand. Especially perfect for travel!!

Great game, super colors and repeats games in different ways that holds their attention.Examples:Put dirty looking clothes in laundry basket (drag and drop) amazing to see a little finger do that!Build puzzles.  Circles which include whole, halves and quarter pieces.Match colors such as shoes together, put the color shirt in the same color basket, match the same color shirt to pants,  color clothes to the right color hangersWhat time does the clock say, build a clock as they say the time,Match the numbers to the right color and dotsThere are cute kids jumping up and down and clapping sounds and saying good job and awesome.  There are award balloons to pop.  Naturally we have to clap and say Yeaaah too.  Fun game and the two year old picked up on playing it right away.  Holds his attention for a very long time! (30 minutes or so)

The light is a nice size, the lights are super but I have to question the 8x.  We compared this to a smaller 8x and it wasn't more like a 5 or 6 x if they make those.  My aunt has macular degeneration and can hardly see now.  An 8x is the minimum she needs and this really just didn't work.  If you don't need specifically 8x then this is a nice size light and better than most in that respect.

Wow, I used this shampoo twice and my scalp is already 95 % better. I have psoriasis in spots that drive me crazy.  I have tried a million shampoos and some might work for most of the day and maybe into the next day some but this.....this is by far different from the rest. My scalp is amazing different! No flakes, no dryness, no itching.  Thank you! I can't wait to try other products with soapberries!

As the product description says: Simply, Wrap it, Tape it and Shrink it with your blow dryer! IT'S THAT EASY!  We got three designs so we can change the design. It helps to keep the cast clean as well.  We left part of the cast so it could be signed naturally.  You cut the plastic to fit, tape the edges shut, heat with hair dryer.. wha-la!

Super!  Now I have a radio on my Kindle Fire HD.  Pandora is a plethora of music choices.  This app can be used as set as a alarm, set stations, no commercials, I love, love, love this app. I have no issues with it locking up.  I haven't tried this app on my phone, that could be another matter but on my kindle it is to die for!

This was recommended by an acupuncturist. I can SEE the difference when I take this.  No more pie face, pain is reduced or gone.  Its like ibuprofen but natural instead.  I have taken some just for pain and it worked like a charm.  I use morning and night and will stay on this forever!  Several diseases are inflammation such as asthma, arthritis.  I can say that with me both have improved greatly using this.  Its a keeper!!
Makes a quick browse easy for the kindle.  This app is easy to use with no hang ups and glitches. (I'm using this on Kindle Fire HD)

I didn't find this to be overly fragile. It is glass so yes you do need to take care but its similar to the teapot which is Stovetop, microwave and dishwasher safe. I use it with the {Primula 40-Ounce Daisy Tea Pot with 24 Variety Flavor Flowering Teas}.Using a tea candle it keeps the tea warm for hours! Worth getting. Nice show piece too.  I uses this daily!

It is really fun to see the tea blossom into a flower. Just beautiful and a real show piece.  Since this is mostly green tea you MUST TAKE CARE TO NOT BOIL THE WATER.  Green tea can get bitter if you do.  Makes a big difference.  I love the variety. Jasmine is my favorite. I will buy this again.  Several brews from each bud.The teapot and loose tea infuser are glass.  As it says they are Stovetop, microwave and dishwasher safe.  I have had no problem with the infuser breaking or fragile.  It is glass so you need to take care naturally.  I also got the tea warmer which uses a tea candle.  It keeps the tea warm for hours without cooking the tea.

Forget it. I pay enough for Charter.  It is $30 a month (Bundled) for 12 months then goes up.  I hate when they say FREE and it isn't.  I'm not much of a TV watcher anyway but since they said FREE what the heck. NOT.You need to be a real TV addict to pay another $30 to watch TV on the go. When you can record for $5 a month, why?

I love my rock and roll but this is amazing.  I bought the whole CD of songs. I normally pick and choose the best but this was just so lovely!!!!  I can just imagine Philip playing. He indeed has magic fingers!Two others I can highly recommend is Michele Mclaughin and Yiruma.  Yiruma I pick and choose but he has some that are addicting and Michele bless her for such a young age she is amazing.
I used this on the trunk of my motorcycle.  He looks like he is peaking out the truck.  I have seen chuckles as I pass and people grabbing their cell phones to take a picture.  Too cute.

I use this on my kindle HD.  I have used this often wandering the halls at night.  The brightness is adjustable.  It also has some fun things like Christmas flashing lights, strobe,  Color picker and ambiance setting. That changes color slowly (or at your adjust speed).  Pretty cool app!!

Comfort food that you don't gain weight on. He has thought of it all.  There is a pizza crust made of cauliflower that is to die for. I like it better than bread crust. It just has a lovely flavor!  As a rule eating the way Dr Berg suggests I crave nothing. For the first time I am not starving, I'm not craving and hunting down sugar like a wild person, I have threatened no one if I don't get that last piece of whatever.  I have always hated those skinny bit*#es that 'forget to eat' Really??? Who does that!!!! ME!! ME!!! In a million years I would have Never ever thought I could say ME!You MUST rush over to youtube and watch his videos. You will have an amazing amount of education that is life changing!  Thank you thank you Dr Berg.Customer service at his office is outstanding and a hoot.  I did ask if they could package Dr Berg with my order and send him too. They did say they would try their best. Can't ask for more than that!Super, super info!!!
Because they are magnetic they stay stacked nicely in the drawer instead of all over the place. I just LOVE that. I have never seen this feature before.  I'm a neat nick so that makes me real happy!

I got it for 'ghost hunting' (and playing with the kids.)  Basically its a recorder.  You have about a minute to record a question or just record air for that matter and then play it back. There is a reverse mode with for the ghost voices sometimes that matters.  I recommend going to youtube and searching Huff Paranormal.  He is a wealth of information on the subject.Do you pick up ghosts on this. Well, I say yes.  The more you use a recorder, consistently the more action you get. Very cool.As for playing with kids, they recorder their sentence, Hello my name is...  When you play it back there are several playback modes that make the giggles roll.  There is the normal which kids love to hear their voices but then there are several different play back modes:Clean: the original recordingHelium, (3 modes of that)Slo-mo.  (deep voice, slow)Zombie talkEcho RoomOld Vinyl (scratchy and mono sound, puts you back in the past of the 78's)Talk box - robot typeRobotic - kind of like Rosie on the Jeffersons cartoonHarmonics - alien like, not that I have talked with aliens (yet) but duel sound of your voice. Kind of creepy.  lolScanner -like a breaker, breaker CB type.Announcer - Like an echo stadium speaker.  Makes your feel like a big shot.Metal Fuzz - gotta be thereStroboscope - like strobe light but voiceDroid High - Rosies boyfriend from the Jefferson cartoonDroid Low - Different boyfriend of RosieIts fun, worth getting!!PS on this.... I am using this on my kindle HD. If you use this on your phone there is a section where you can set what you record as your ringtone.  :-)

I had a kindle before the Kindle fire ( and I waited for the HD version) that I loved but was becoming limited since I also wanted to convenience of checking email and going on the internet, following links in a ebook etc.  I was so in love with my regular kindle and was a reading fool on that thing. I had a relationship with it. Lets face it, I slept with it more than I have any man. Lol.  Giving it up and moving on was not an easy decision.Kindle vs Kindle Fire HD vs Fire HDX.Kindle:  Love the light shining on the book rather back lit.  It is far less stressful reading.  The gray background allowed me to read forever easily.  I loved how easy it was to organize books. However, it had become limited.  I couldnt really surf the internet, magazines and pictures wouldnt work on it well and it was black and white.  Pretty sure you know the rest.Kindle Fire:  I dont by the first of anything because it will improve and become cheaper.  The biggest issue with the kindle fire was it didnt have a reader and I do use that often.  The front page was a bookshelf which is ok but couldnt organize like the reg kindle.Kindle Fire HD:  I hate the carousel on kindle fire HD.  Its a circle of icons in which the last thing you opened goes up there.  Want it or not.  You can delete from the carousel but something else will pop up there that is on your device. It has a set number of icons it wants there and it will keep it filled.  Grrr.  I wish it would just go away.  I liked how I could organize my books on the regular kindle.  That said, there are apps that make that happen so it makes life easier. You know there HAS to be an app for that!  Over all the organization isnt bad. Its simple to use.  My six year old can use it no problem. But then again, kids are born knowing these things today.  Being back lit vs light shining on the book isnt as easy to read as the original kindle was.  The back light can be adjusted way down which is a plus. I dont think this is a big issue to most people.  Im dyslexic and having dimmer light on the gray background rocked!  I could be a reading fool.  I cant read as long on this.  As I said though for most people that probably isnt an issue.  After my withdraw from my original kindle I love this one.  SO much more you can do with it!!  The battery doesnt last like the original but we are doing WAY more with this one than just read.  AND naturally there is an app for that!!!  There are battery savers that shut down what isnt needed and does make a difference in battery life.  Considering with I do however I think the battery isnt bad. I play music and a game at the same time or music and read, music and read.  I am asking a lot! I was use to the other battery lasting for weeks.  One plus is my phone charger works for the kindle.  Im just overall too happy with the upgrade to Kindle Fire HD.HD vs HDX.I got the HD with Ads because I didnt care to pay to not have them. Im really glad I did that.  I like the ads.  There were some movie and TV trailers that I would have otherwise missed.  Product ads you never know but they aren't annoying at all.My son bought the HDX.  He loves it.As far as I can tell the big difference is with the HDX you can have Wifi and cell towers.  Oh and the live help.  I asked if I could upgrade because it came out right after I bought my HD. The answer was no, I would need to sell it myself.  Im glad I didnt. I dont need to use cell towers.  Some might where they live but I dont.  As for live help, once you learn your kindle do you really need that?  I didnt for the price difference.  Last I knew it was a good $200 difference.  Im sure the price will go down, the HD will be priced at peanuts and it will all balance out in time.  It seems about a year is when the big price change happens.Good luck with your new decisions!
