These are great for people in professions that work with their hands such as mechanics or factory workers.  These rings allow them to still sport a wedding band without risk to their fingers when they are working.  They are also great for people who do a lot of outdoor activities that could cause the same risks with a metal band.  I received these silicone wedding bands at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of them at all.  This is a great set of wedding bands and I would absolutely recommend them:)!!

This is a really fun set of flying helicopter balloons.  They are super simple to assemble and loads of fun for kids.  This set comes with paint to paint the propellers so that your kids can make them unique and their own.  My kids love to paint and decorate so this part was super fun for them.  Once you have them painted and the paint is dry which will only take an hour or so, you can assemble them and play with them.  I would suggest playing outside with them because they don't always fly straight and sometimes go quite high so they could definitely knock small items off of shelves and things like that inside the house.  Each helicopter is separated into its own bag with all of the pieces you need for that helicopter which makes it really easy to put them together.  The set is enough to make six helicopters and these would be a great party favor at a birthday party or a craft to do at the party.  Most kids love balloons and things that fly and this brings both together and they get to feel like they built it and personalized it with painting. This is a nice little kit that even includes the paint to decorate and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

These little Chinese LED hanging lanterns are so super cute.  They are a really nice fabric material on the outside and are of very nice quality in my opinion.  I have seen others of these that are made of a paper like material and easily tear and do not last very long without getting worn out.  These are much nicer. The lanterns have a center plastic piece that hooks to each bulb and so they can be taken apart easily and the lanterns themselves collapse right down for easy storage when you aren't using them. I received these Chinese lanterns at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of them at all.  This is a well made and fun set of lights and I would absolutely recommend them:)!!

This Quadcore home electronic pest repeller is pretty awesome and has a lot of different uses.  I have purchased similar devices in the past but with much less options available in one unit.  This plugs right into a standard outlet for ease of use and has on/off control switches on the sides for each feature making it easy to turn on whatever features you want active and shut off any that you don't want.  There are four different options for pest control all built into this one little device.  There is the ultrasonic repelling which sends out a high frequency sound to repel insects and rodents.  What I like best about this is that it doesn't seem to bother my dogs at all because I was worried that it might.  There is also a switch to reduce mosquitos.  A third switch is electromagnetic and helps to repel pests that may be deep in your walls.  Lastly there is an air clean switch which puts negative charges into the air to help repel pests.  My biggest concern is spiders and we have also had a few mice get into the house from the garage so I turned on all of the switches except the mosquito switch and so far I have to say that I have seen less spiders in the living room where this is plugged in.  We also have not caught a mouse in the standard mouse trap in almost a week so this does seem to be making a difference.  I received this pest repeller at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a great little device that seems to be working well and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

I truly love everything about this water resistant waist pack.  It comes in several colors but I got the rose red and I am so glad I did.  The color is bright and vibrant and just really pops with the yellow accents.  It is fun and fashionable as well as being super useful when I am out for a walk or short hike.  There is a water bottle pouch as well as a couple of zippered pouches to hold all of my must have take along items.  There is plenty of room for my keys, phone, money, and meds as well as some small snacks or other items.  It has reflective pieces on it as well to add a safety feature while I am on the road so I can be seen more easily.  The waist strap is comfortable and adjustable and has a durable buckle to open and close it around your waist.  There is a thick foam type piece that backs the entire waist pack and goes against your body when you wear it.  There are vent holes in it and it helps to wick away moisture as you walk, run, or hike and keeps the sweat from building up between you and the waist pack.  This is a really nice feature.  I also find it makes it very comfortable to wear and sits nicely against my waist.  I received this waist pack at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a really nice waist pack and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

One thing I really love about this speaker is its size.  I have other waterproof speakers and they are much smaller than this one.  I like that this one is large and has big buttons and a digital display as well.  My other speakers don't have a display and I think that is a huge bonus in this one.  It has three large suction cups on the back making it very easy to mount securely to your wall or mirror for use without concern of it falling or sliding once in place.  To get started with this speaker it needs to be charged which can be done with the included standard USB charging cable.  Then you pair it to your device by way of your bluetooth menu.  Once paired you can play music from your device or receive calls using this speaker as a hands free device.  There is a built in microphone and an easy push button answering feature.  This is so handy because I can't even recall the number of times that I no sooner get into the shower and my phone rings.  Now I can answer it without reaching out soak and wet and worrying about drowning my phone in the process.  I also love to listen to music while I shower or have a nice bubble bath and this is a perfect way to do that without worrying about it getting wet.  The sound from this speaker is great in my opinion and I can also hear well on a phone call and the reception seems to be good from the microphone as well because my husband said he could hear me on his end quite well also.  I received this waterproof shower speaker at at discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a great shower speaker with some really nice features and it works great and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

I am very sentimental and find myself keeping quite a few pieces of my childrens' clothing as they outgrow it on the chance that they may want it for their kids one day.  I put these items into storage tubs in our attic but I am finding the tubs filling up quickly.  These space saver vacuum bags are a great solution to this problem.  This is a very large set of fifteen bags so I was able to reduce the space needed in the tubs quite significantly by packing the items first into these storage bags.  This also helps ensure that they are staying clean and moisture free while in storage and nothing is able to get into them.  What I really love most about this bag is that it comes with its own manual pump which most other bags likes these that I have seen do not.  The set includes various sized bags to meet all of your storage needs.  It comes with one jumbo bag, three extra large bags, four large bags, four medium bags, two suit case roll up bags, and one small roll up bag.  These bags have a slider to close the top of the bag and a cap where you suck the air out on the side.  These are very easy to use and work great.  I received these vacuum storage bags at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of them at all.  This is a great set of storage bags and I would absolutely recommend them:)!!

This is a really beautiful bbq tool set that is not only practical but looks great too.  It comes in a stainless case with a nice solid handle and two latches on the front that keep it closed.  It is a nice, heavy-duty case that not only looks impressive, but also is great for storing and protecting all of the grill tools.  This set includes a nice wide faced spatula that is great for flipping meats and also has a serrated edge that allows you to cut with it as well.  There is even a built in bottle opener for the griller who likes to enjoy a cold beverage while grilling up a great meal.  The set also includes tongs, a grill brush with extra cleaning head, basting brush, and even two skewers, and four pairs of corn holders.  I have never seen a grilling set that even included corn holders so I thought that was pretty awesome.  Each piece is stainless and built to last.  Most corn holders I have owned in the past had plastic handles and often cracked after several uses.  These are very rugged and the little points are very sharp and stick into the corn cob nicely.  This set would make a really great gift for the grill lover in your life and is quite an impressive presentation in its fancy case.  I received this grilling tool set at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a great set and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

These packing cubes are awesome and make packing so much easier.  I really like having things organized in my suitcase when I travel because it makes finding what I need so much easier when I get to my hotel room.  I often live out of my suitcase on vacation instead of unpacking everything and using the hotel dresser.  These cubes help to keep my clothing items separate and easy to find.  I use the smaller one for socks and undergarments and the other two to separate other pieces of clothing depending on what it is that I pack.  These are well made and nice sized packing cubes.  The zippers zip all the way around both sides so you can flip the top all the way back and have them wide open making them super easy to pack and use.  The zippers work great and close nicely but also move easily and don't catch.  The material of these packing cubes is durable but lightweight and they are a very nice quality.  I received these packing cubes at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of them at all.  These cubes are a must have in my opinion for making packing easier and more organized and I would absolutely recommend them:)!!

I got this for my daughter to study for the AP Biology exam and so far she is very happy with it.  She loves that there is information and also questions that help her prepare well for the test.  There were various options of study books to choose from online but I like the format of this one the best and I feel it provides the most help with comparable test questions.

I can't say enough about how much I love this eye mask.  It is a bad time of year for me because I suffer from extreme allergies and I get severe sinus headaches and make it hard for me to even keep my eyes open without intense pain.  I had a bad allergy attack yesterday and my head felt like it was going to explode.  The pain was almost unbearable and then I remembered this eye mask.  I usually use my various compresses for cold therapy and had almost forgotten that this can also be used warm.  I stuck it in the microwave for thirty seconds and pulled it out and slipped it into the super soft zippered cover.  I then placed it over my eyes and forehead and put the strap around my head.  I couldn't believe how much the warm helped to relieve some of the pain and pressure on my sinuses.  It is not a miracle cure by any means but definitely made a big difference in my comfort level.  I laid down on the couch and just let the warm soothe my sinuses and was actually able to finally relax a bit.  The soft cover is so comfortable to use and it gently hugged my face without being too tight or uncomfortable but with the just the right amount of pressure.  I received this eye mask at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This eye mask is amazing and I would absolutely 110% recommend it:)!!

I was quite impressed when I received this microphone.  You really can't beat all that you get for the price.  It came in a nice reusable box that has a little tab that keeps it closed and nicely stores all the parts when they aren't being used.  The front of the box is a clear plastic so you can see what is inside without opening it and I think this would also make a great presentation for giving this as a gift to anyone who likes to sing.  The box includes the microphone itself, the wireless receiver, the antenna that attaches to the microphone, batteries, and also a cord for using it wired.  This is super easy to use.  You unscrew the base of the mic and install a battery and open the cover of the receiver and install a battery.  When using this wirelessly you plug the antenna into the end of the mic and plug the receiver into your stereo.  For wired use you plug the cord into the mic instead of the antenna and plug the other end into your stereo.  The button to turn on the mic is on the side and has two settings depending on if you are using wired or wireless.  I found the sound to be great and the reception to work very well.  I received this wired and wireless optional microphone at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a great mic at a great price and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

This is an awesome little FM transmitter that even comes with a remote.  This is so simple to use and works exceptionally well.  I have tried some of these in the past that pick up a lot of interference and you have to have a very dead station to get them to work, but this one was not that way at all.  It is a powerful little transmitter that actually worked on a station that I could hear some faint music on.  I paired it with my phone and was easily able to play the music through the speakers in my car with no interference from the station itself.  I love that the transmitter part can be removed from the part that plugs into the cigarette lighter.  It is magnetic and attaches firmly but is also easily removed it you want to use it without it being attached.  The part that plugs into the cigarette lighter has a USB port so that you can easily charge your device while using it with its standard USB charing cord.  Aside from playing music this can also be used for hands free calling.  This device is fairly compact too which is nice because it isn't bulky and in the way when being used.  I think that this works exceptionally well and is a nice design that is very well made.  I received this transmitter at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a nice transmitter and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

This is a nice little MP3/MP4 player at a very reasonable price.  This comes with a charging cord, ear buds, and even a wrist strap to attach and carry it with.  It's gold in color and comparable in size to an Apple iPod nano.  It has 8GB of internal storage and a memory card slot allowing you to expand the storage with up to 64 more GB.  This is small and lightweight and great for on the go.  You can also watch video on it.  It has an alarm and you can even record voice with the built in microphone.  There is an external speaker or you can listen with the included ear buds.  It can also be hooked up to external speakers with an aux cable.  This comes with an instruction manual also and is quite easy to use.  This is a great alternative to a much more expensive iPod and you still get all the great features.  I received this MP4 player at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a great little music and video player with some awesome other features as well and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

I got an embroidery machine last Christmas and have found that these tear away backings are actually somewhat hard to find in any of my local stores.  Even our local walmart doesn't carry these and so I have found that ordering them on line is the best way to get them quickly when I need them.  What I love about these is that they are pre-cut 8"x8" squares.  A lot of what I have ordered the past is big bolts of it and needs to be cut down.  These are much easier to work with and are a great size for most projects I would want to do.  This set includes one hundred sheets so they last me for quite some time and are much cheaper than others I have ordered in the past.  The quality and thickness is perfect and I find that they are durable but also easy to tear away when I am done embroidering.  I received this set of tear away backing sheets at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of them at all.  This is a great package of embroidery sheets and I would absolutely recommend them:)!!

This is a nice set of silicone wedding rings for men.  The set includes size 8, 9, 10, 11, and 12 which is nice because if your weight fluctuates or your hands swell at all which many people deal with, you can just switch sizes as you need to.  Each ring comes in a nice little plastic hinged box which is also great for gifting or storing the rings.  The rings are solid black and a nice thick silicone that is durable but designed to break to protect your finger when needed.  These rings are great for guys who work with their hands or do a lot of outdoor activities.  If the ring snags on something it will break before injuring your finger.  This allows men to keep their hands safe but still display a ring showing they are married.  This set also came with a bonus massage ball which is nice and hard with little nubs all over it and feels great for massages.  I received this silicone ring set at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review but that does not affect my opinion of it at all.  This is a nice set and I would absolutely recommend it:)!!

This organizer is awesome!! I crochet and order so much yarn it's ridiculous! I also start several projects, so I wanted something that would hold yarn for one or two projects and not have yarn all over the house.This is perfect. I am doing a project that calls for 4 yarns and it hold them nicely <I put 4 Red Heart Super Saver yarns inside, and they're pretty big>...the inside has a 4 way separator so your yarn doesn't get tangled. There are 4 holes on the top where your yarn comes out. There's metal grommets so your yarn also doesn't snag. And a handle so you can easily pick it up and carry with you.You can put 4 big skeins inside or you can put small ones...I did put 4 smaller skeins in one compartment <16 in all> and that yarn was safe until I needed to use the organizer. You could put yarn in 3 and hooks/needles in the last one...however you want to use this.This organizer works perfectly for my needs.

My husband & I started drinking coffee recently. One particular brand comes in vacuum sealed bags - but only in 8 ounce bags, so I order several at a time. I wanted something that would hold more then 2 bags because the bags take up a lot of cabinet space.I ordered the Cobalt first and the canister hold a ton of the coffee beans I have. I ordered 2 of the Rose ones for the ground coffee and for my Tea. This canister holds over 45 bags of my Tea...that's the amount I had and there's still room for more!! So far in the 2nd one I put 2 and a half bags of our ground coffee and it's perfect!The cap works just fine. If you don't push the "button" on the top side, you can't really push the cap on, nor does it come off. That's a good thing!Yes, these are a bit pricey but in my honest opinion - well worth it.I may just order more for my chocolates & sugars!

I have bought all kinds of Downy products and had stopped for a while because it's one of the priciest laundry products out there. I decided to give it another try with Downy Infusion because I liked to sound of the scents, and the price didn't seem to bad for the size of the bottle.Well, I'm a whole lot disappointed. I actually ordered 2 different scents, and the other bottle had tape around the cap so it didn't open during shipping and it was in a bag. This bottle only had a bag and the cap was almost off. It would have been a HUGE mess, but the actual softener never left the bottle. Why?The softener was the consistency of peanut butter and pudding. Seriously. To get this out of the bottle, I had to turn it upside down and pound the bottom of the bottle. I got a blob in my new washing machine and did a load of towels. When I opened my machine, not only was the blob of Downy was still there, but some of it came out and blobbed onto a towel. I put the towels through a rinse just to get the blobs to go away, and it didn't work so I had to hand rinse them.As far as the scent goes, it didn't have any.I can only hope that this is a bad bottle. The other scent that I bought is fine, even though that one has bad reviews for the same issue I have with this scent, so I don't know what to think.I can't honestly recommend this product that I can't use and had to throw away.

My husband and I ride our Harley at least once a week, and my hair is very long <down to my waist>. I'm always looking for cool ways to keep my hair protected, and keep it from getting knots in it. If you've ever ridden a bike and have tried to brush your hair afterwards - you know all about those knots!I have purchased a lot of these ! I like variety! I've purchased the really expensive ones and these cheaper ones. I have found NO difference in them. They're all light weight, they're all stretchy. They keep your head cool if you wear a helmet, which I do. I live in Central Texas where the past 3 summers have been unbelievably hot - 100 plus degrees every single day for almost 3 months. My head usually sweats so bad under my helmet that my hair is matted to my head....but using these headscarves my head doesn't sweat nearly as much. Not to mention that because these are long, they keep my hair knot free.I don't know about keeping your head warm because we haven't had cool/cold weather yet....but I will update once that happens.Honestly...this is just as good as the pricey head scarves. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase again.

My Grandmother left me her entire Silver Set when she passed and I've done OK keeping it clean, but since we moved to Texas I guess the humidity has not been good for it because after 8 months it is all black...and I mean SO darn black. This set actually belonged to my Great Grandmother and is over 120 years old. It's gorgeous! I actually had to wash it first and that took some of the black off. There are several pieces to this set that have extremely intricate detail and nothing I do ever gets it super clean. I decided to get this brush to help get into those places.When I got this brush I thought - There's NO way this soft brush is going to do anything to my silver. Boy was I wrong!!! I put some cleaner on the brush and then started to clean the silver. I used it on one of the serving dishes that has this "Grape & Vine" design around the outer 3 inches of the plate, and then I rinsed it in warm water. I was AMAZED at just how clean the silver plate is!! It looks awesome. <My mother won't have a heart attack now if she were to see it!!> This plate is one of the oldest pieces so I know I won't ever get it 100% clean, but I know that would decrease the value...so I'm OK with that. The black that is around the design actually enhances the beauty ~ I think!When I was finished, I cleaned the brush with Dawn and warm water and it's ready for the next cleaning. I did notice a couple of hairs came out, but I attribute that to the hair getting stuck in the really intricate parts of the silver - so it was expected. But only a few hairs came out...the brush is still in great condition.Would I recommend this brush? ABSOLUTELY! If it can get my silver as clean as it did - you won' be disappointed! I cleaned the entire set - which took me 2 weeks <yes I have many pieces>, and it looks beautiful! I even cleaned some of my silver jewelry and it got into places I couldn't get and made it look brand new.I'll be buying more so I'm never without this brush!

I absolutely LOVE my Head "Sock"!!The material is thin which is perfect for my needs, it stretches just right and fits like a glove EVERY time I wear it.I use these <I have several> when we ride the Harley because I have very long hair and these hair socks are perfect...no tangles whatsoever after riding. It stays put - no coming off in the wind...which is another plus for me. I've had lots of traditional bandanas fly off in the wind. I also like that this wicks moisture away from my head while wearing it...no sweaty head on hot days and also - it keeps the warmth in on cooler days. AND I love that I can wear it many different ways.I've washed this 2 times and it remains in the same excellent condition as I got it in.If you ride a bike and are looking for something to protect your hair - this is THE hair sock to get - and at a great price too! <Harley dealers charge $25 for theirs!>I would definitely recommend this!

I started knitting/crocheting last year and have tried quite a few things to keep my hooks/needles, looms, etc.in, plus something I could put yarn or fabric in so when I'm working the yarn isn't rolling around on the floor. I bought a yarn jug and it works fine but the one thing I don't like about it is it constantly falls over.I received this caddy a few days ago and it is absolutely perfect. It has 3 pockets in the front for me to store anything I want...scissors, hooks...whatever...but the inside is what makes me happy! It has a slippery fabric in the inside so when my yarn or fabric is in there....it just rolls right out. No snags...I'm currently making a couple of rag rugs and my balls of fabric are quite large...at least 8 to 10 inches around, and they fit just fine inside with room to spare. I have a couple of pouches that have hooks on them, and I've got a bunch of tools in them, and the hooks fit nicely around the wood at each end, and they don't interfere with my fabric/yarn when I'm working.I saw somebody say this was flimsy, but in my opinion it's pretty sturdy. I have a lot of supplies etc in mine and it is in no way flimsy....it's very strong. As long as I take good care of it, it should last me a long time. My mother has had one for more then 50 years and it still looks new.I would definitely recommend this to anyone who knits or crochets, or any other craft really!

I purchased 2 of these rugs for the entry way in my home.In the photo, it looks to be a blueish grey color with ivory/white. If you look at the close up you can see other colors within the ivory/white.In person, this is such a gorgeous rug! It is indeed a blueish grey color <more grey though>, but the ivory/white had SO many tiny colors throughout - it's absolutely beautiful.This is a very well made rug and I know it will last a long time. The price was fantastic and seller shipped fast. I will definitely be purchasing more rugs from this company very soon as we are upgrading our outdoor patio and our bedroom...and these rugs are just perfect.I highly recommend!!

I have severe Fibromyalgia and Rheumatoid Arthritis, as well as sffered a broken neck and back, with over 46 surgeries.. So much so that I have a Morphine Pain Pump in my body giving me Morphine 24 hours a day. We have a Garden Jacuzzi that has 6 jets, but the jets stopped working about 4 years ago...so it's just a tub now. The jets in our tub used to do wonders for me. I would sit in it for 20 minutes every day, and it helped me move easier and decreased my pain.I don't know how I found this, but when I saw it, read the description and saw the price - I had to give it a try, so I ordered it.My husband and I set it up, which took all of abut 10 minutes. It blows up easy, and fast. We were able to fill this in just over 30 minutes or so. It really didn't take that long. I had also ordered all the chemicals I thought I would need and they got here the day before the Hot Tub..so I put everything in and we waited until after supper to get in it. I should say we put it out on our back porch, so it sat in the sun for about 7 hours. I live in Central Texas where the temperature has been over 100 degrees every day for 2 weeks now, so the water was 101 degrees, without even turning the heater on.We both got in the hot tub, and filling the water to the bottom fill line was perfect. The water comes up to our necks when we are both sitting. We turned on the bubbles, and let me tell you what....I wasn't expecting what we got. I was leaning my back on the wall of the hot tub and when the bubbles got turned on...they actually pushed me off the wall. The bubbles in my hot tub are STRONG. This Hot tub is BETTER then my bathtub jacuzzi. No...the bubbles aren't like jets in a jacuzzi...targeting your back or legs.....the ring for the bubbles goes 3/4 of the way around the pool and the holes for the bubbles are at the bottom...so the bubbles rise up. But honestly....this is absolutely PERFECT.Now I can put on my bathing suit and sit in the Hot Tub, with my husband, comfortably and when I get out I feel amazing. If I could post a video so you could see these bubbles - I would..I only know how to do photos.When we did turn on the heater...it only took a few hours to heat all the way to 104. But living where I do - I haven't had to do that in 2 weeks because the sun and heat has heated the water all by itself...and the temperature always reads 104, but we think the water is much hotter. We got it in yesterday, which was the hottest day so far and we actually had to go down slowly....the water was HOT hot hot.It took us a few tries to figure out what chemicals to add and when, but so far the water is clear, doesn't stink and checks out perfect on the test strips. We haven't had to empty and refill yet.I purchased a few repair kits just in case....but haven't had to use yet. And we haven't had to blow the pool up or the cover...they're both still blown up the same as when we first did it.All in all...this is the PERFECT Hot Tub for my husband and I. The price was right and we don't regret this purchase at all. If anything happens to this one - I would come right back and buy another one...maybe even the bigger one!!

Absolutely PERFECT!I have a "Plum Crazy" 2007 Dodge Daytona Charger with Black Interior. I had my windows tinted as dark as the law would allow. I live in Central Texas, where the past few summers, including this summer where the temperature has been over 100 every single day for weeks. The heat index is around 105 to 107. It is HOT!When I get in my car, it is so hot I can't breathe. We roll all the windows down, turn on the air and not only does it take minutes to cool off, but the seats are so hot <yep - leather> they burn your booty. Not to mention making fried sausages out of your fingers on the steering wheel.I saw this sun protector and purchased it immediately. With all the great reviews how could I not?!This fits my windshield like a glove. Truly, it's like it was made for my car. There's no excess, it's not too small <at all>...it's *Perfect*!It was 109 today with a heat index of 116. I had to go to a doctor appointment and was almost excited to get in my car. I was able to open up the car, get in without the use of my rescue inhaler, sit on my seats without burning the buns,  turn the car on and the air...no burned fingers/hands!! It took about a minute for the air to cool it off the rest of the way - and I was on my way.It stores nicely when not in use..and is as light as a feather.SO ~ I would not only HIGHLY recommend this sun protector to anyone looking to cut down the heat in their car, but I wouldn't hesitate to purchase more. In fact I'm getting one for my husband for his new truck.I'm THRILLED with this purchase!!!

I ordered this gum from another online vendor and got a 1 pound bag, and not only do my husband and I love it, that little bag was gone i a week!!! So I came to Amazon to see if anyone sold it, and thankfully I found a few!I ordered several items from The Candy Peddler and they're fantastic! everything got here on time and perfect. This gum is awesome - my husband and I usually can't eat just 1 or 2...we grab handfuls! But - after 2 we need a little break because the hot cinnamon flavor gets really hot and spicy! I could say the flavor doesn't last long, but here's the thing - the initial hot and spicy flavor burst you get when you first start chewing last for a short while, but you still get cinnamon flavor after that, and for a while. It's worth it!I will be buying more from this seller soon! Great service and great items!

I LOVE my new Ottomon!!Need Storage?? This holds a TON of stuff...I currently have somewhere in the vicinity of 50 skeins of yarn and a few other items. This is well made, heavy, and is durable enough to sit on. My husband has sat on it and he's 250. It does have some weight to it, but it's not so heavy that I can't move it <I broke my back and neck and can't lift much> empty or filled, and it is filled to the top. It goes together fast with no tools required. You just fold it up, place the divider and put the top on. Simple. I love the amount of storage this Ottomon holds and it looks great in my living room. Great price too!!I highly recommend!

I've been looking for a blue wedge for a while now, and thought this boot would be perfect.The quality of the shoe is great - well made. As soon as I tried one on, I knew they would be shipped back. I wear a 6.5 but for some reason this boot was too small. I couldn't get my foot all the way in, and I didn't have on socks.  I also felt the heel was a bit taller....it says 4.25" heel but felt taller.This is the first return I've made with Amazon in my 8 years of being an Amazon customer. It was very easy to do the return, they got it within a 3 days, and my refund was made the day I requested a refundAll in all, the shoe is well made and beautiful, and despite the fact the show was too small, I would purchase from this seller again.

Since you can't make more then 1 review on a product, I have added a 2nd review of this pillow below my first. I didn't buy it for me but for my husband who has Sleep Apnea...First a little info about why I purchased this pillow for myself.I am a Disabled Veteran. I broke my neck and back while on active duty. I also have severe Fibromyalgia and Rheumatoid Arthritis. Since I broke my neck & back, I have ad 44 surgeries. 5 of those surgeries have been on my neck, and I am fused at C4/5, C5/6 and C6/7 and I have  Titanium Plates and Titanium Screws in my neck <and more in my lower back!> so it takes a lot to get me comfortable. I also re-broke my neck 12 years after the first time <re-broke my back as well the same time>. I am on a long list of medication, to include having a Pain Pump surgically implanted in my body that gives me Morphine 24 hours a day.I also haven't had a decent nights sleep in over 10 years, and I usually only get anywhere from 2 to 4 hours of sleep a night, and get cat naps throughout the day.. For the past 4 years, I've been sleeping on a couch because I cannot lay flat and I need very firm support for my neck <and back too>. We've been trying to find a good mattress so I can actually sleep in my own bed, but I haven't found one that is comfortable enough and gives me enough support for my back. I also can't afford the hefty $7000 - $10,000 price tag on a Sleep Number or I Comfortbed, that would be perfect for me.I can't tell you how any pillows I've purchased over the past 25 years...but it is a ridiculous amount. Just in the past 6 months, I've bought 8 on Amazon, and at least 20 from Walmart and other stores here where I live. I have spent a LOT. The pillows I've gotten have been nice, but they go flat and get lumpy after a few weeks and don't hold up to what I need a pillow to do for me. I came back to Amazon because #1 - Icannot go shopping like most people, and # 2 - there are so many different pillows to choose from, I thought there had to be one for me.That's when I found the Snuggle Pillow made by Relief-Mart. I read all of the reviews, which aren't many, and made the decision to try it out. How many companies will let you try out a pillow for 90 days, and if you're not satisfied - you can send it back for a refund?? None that I know of. So yes, this pillow is pricey and I don't make a lot of money from my disability pay and $70 is a lot for me to shell out for a pillow, but if I don't like it I can get my money back.Before my pillow even got to me, the company sent me an email thanking me for my purchase. They told me a little bit about who they are, and how the pillow is made an how it will come to me, and told me if I ever had any questions not to hesitate to email or call. In my 8 years of buying on Amazon, I have never had a company email me, EVER!My pillow came within the time frame promised, in a box that I thought - wow they really do shrink it a lot!! They included a sheet with infoabout the pillow, and contact information as well. I took my pillow out of the box and it was rolled up like a sleeping bag and they sucked ALL the air out of it! I have to say, this pillow is substantially heavier then any other pillow I've owned <and that is a lot of pillows!> but not so heavy that it's difficult to handle. It took a little while to puff up to it's normal size which was fine as I got it early in the day. I did not notice any kind of smell that was so horrible it bothered me. It is foam and shipped in plastic so I knew there would be a light odor, but it really wasn't anything to complain about. Besides, you can wash it if it does offend you. I just put a pillow case on it and used it that night.That night was the first night in over 10 years that not only did I get 6 1/2 hours of sleep without waking up, but I also didn't wake up. Due to the Morphine and Vicodin and other meds I'm on, I get hot and cold and usually wake up cold from sweating.Not only did I wake up NOT sweaty or cold, but my neck felt pretty darn good! I can't remember when I've had such a good nights sleep, honestly. I've had this pillow for 5 days now, and I have had the best sleep ever. My neck isn't stiff, and doesn't hurt when I wake upI got another email from the company 2 days after I got the pillow asking me if I liked the pillow. Honestly - that really blew me away. I love that this company uses all U.S. made materials in their products and that they do not outsource their employees. Not only that, but how many companies back their product, and a pillow at that for 20, yes TWENTY YEARS? If my pillow ever goes flat, I return it for a new one. That is incredible.Obviously I can't say anything about how it has been over a long period of time because I've only had this pillow for just a week...but I willabsolutely update my review after a month and every few months after that.I can't recommend this pillow enough. It's very well made with high quality materials and the exterior is extremely soft on my skin. The pillow is the best pillow I've ever owned and has given me the best sleep of my life since I broke my neck twice. The company obviously cares about it's customers because they've contacted me twice and I've only had it a week, so their customer service has far exceeded my expectations. A 90 day Trial with a full refund and a 20 year warranty?? AWESOME.I would do just about anything to get my health back, so to be able to get sleep, and a GOOD nights sleep at that, means a lot to me. To me, I would pay double what this pillow cost.I apologize for the lengthy review. I just wanted to anyone who reads my review to understand why I LOVE this pillow! Give it a try, you will not be disappointed!UPDATE Janary 29 2015:I purchased another Snuggle-Pedic Pillow for my husband. He has Sleep Apnea and uses a CPAP at night. He started sleeping on his back once he started using the CPAP, and he wakes up every day with a stiff neck and I think the people in the next county can hear his neck crack when he first moves his head/neck, not to mention he takes a lot of Motrin just to help loosen his neck a little every morning. I love my new S-P pillow, from day one, so I decided to get him one. He absolutely LOVES it. No more stiff neck, and the cracking has really been reduced. I haven't seen him take 1 Motrin since he got the pillow, so that's great.As far as I go - I still think this is the best pillow around. I am sleeping a minimum of 5-6 hours a night, which is far better then the 2-3 I was getting. It's made a huge difference in my health.UPDATE September 2015 ~ I've had this pillow for almost a full year now <got it Dec 2014> and I still LOVE it to death. Over the past 9 months, I've had the BEST sleep ever. Every single night I get at least 6 hours which has been a HUGE help to my health.I have washed it many times and it still looks brand new, and it still has the same fullness as when I first got it! There isn't one thing I could possibly say derogatory about this pillow. It is WELL worth every single dollar.Since getting our pillows, we were able to get a new bed <Thank you MF!!>that just makes everything about sleeping amazing. I no longer dread going to sleep!Thank you to everyone for all of your comments and help. I've had 5 more surgeries just this year so I didn't reply to a lot of you, but I did see the posts and appreciate all of your kind comments and help!

I bought this to hold the 15 Chuggington train/cars I got my grandson for Christmas.I was going to wrap each one individually and decided against it...he is only 2 and I think it's easier for him if I wrap all the cars in the carrier. I took them out of their separate boxes and then opened the carrier to put them in, and the first one did not fit. I knew just by looking at the car and carrier that that specific car was too big to fit the small "hole".I guess I didn't pay attention to some reviews nor the description <not that it says only certain ones fit this carrier!>, and only after getting on here and reading it did I find that some do not fit.The one's that I bought that DO fit are: PUFFER PETE, JACKMAN, BREWSTER, MTAMBO, SKYLAR, PIPER, DUNBAR, FROSTINI, ZACH, HARRISON and ACTION CHUGGER.THE 2 THAT DO NOT FIT ARE: KOKO, AND PARROT WILSON.If you look at the ones you want to buy - remember the ones that have the MAGNETIC ball on the end do NOT fit this carrier.They will fit if you pull out the plastic DIVIDERS. I did pull out the last divider and put the 2 larger train cars in there.All in all, it's a cute carrier that holds most of what I ordered. It's pretty sturdy, although my grandson won't play with this until Christmas - so we'll see how it all goes. I'll update with photos after Christmas!I'd definitely recommend - just be careful on the train cars you get if you want them to fit this carrier!

I make gift bags for everyone at Christmas to use as Stockings because there is at least 10 people at my home, and it's easier for me to put everything in a gift bag then in actual Stockings. So, I wanted to get a few small items for my granddaughter and grandson for Christmas that would fit in their gift bag stocking. I was looking at other toys and this popped up as a recommendation. As a child, I LOVED tops...but back then Tops were made of wood or metal or a combination!I thought it looked cool and really - for $6.50 - how bad could it be? I read a bunch of reviews, good and bad, and decided to get one. It got here yesterday and I am not disappointed.LOTS of reviews say how cheap looking or poorly made this Top is, and I sometimes wonder what people are thinking. It's not expensive, and it IS a toy, right?When I buy toys, I make sure it will be age appropriate and durable. I also take into consideration if they play hard <some kids are very destructive with their toys>.As with a lot of battery operated items in the market, if they come with batteries, most of the time there is a plastic piece in the battery compartment that you have to pull <it will be sticking out of the toy on the bottom> or take out <little plastic or paper pieces are placed on one end of each battery> so the batteries will work. This is one such item. Check your Top for a plastic piece and remove it - or it won't work! It doesn't state it on the box this Top comes in, but you can't miss the plastic piece sticking out of the top!!To operate, all you have to do is pull up the round metal knob on top and it lights up and spins. To turn it off you have to pull up again. If you don't do this - it will stay on until the batteries die. If you pull up and let go, it takes a few seconds to stop, but if you pull up and hold it, it stops immediately.The Top itself does not spin. There is another Top inside the outer plastic shell that does spin. On the bottom of the Top is a very small metal point <not sharp by the way> that once you activate the Top, you put it on the floor and it "looks" like it's actually spinning. The lights are pretty cool - you get all different colors and it's always changing.As far as the battery life - I haven't turned this on and let it stay on for hours to see how long the batteries will last, but I can say that when you get something that is battery operated, the batteries are ALWAYS extremely low quality. I almost always replace batteries immediately so I know the life of the battery will last longer.To get into the battery compartment, you have to flip open 5 little plastic "tabs" on the outermost sides of the Top. You can see 2 of the tabs in the photo. So far these have not just popped open <it's only been a day!>, but I am assuming if you open/close them enough times, they will eventually not close. I say this because there is a choking warning on the box, but there are no small pieces to this toy that would cause choking. I took the bottom cover off to see the battery compartment and no small pieces are in it. You have to use a Phillips screwdriver to open the battery cover. I don't know what, if anything, I am missing! No part of this toy is loose or would make me worry about choking <unless you have a child that had a throat as big as a cow as this is a good sized top - 3 1/2 inches wide by 2 1/2 inches from top to bottom>. HOWEVER - if your child is one who puts everything in their mouth - you may not want this because the 5 tabs could be bitten off - and THAT would choke a child easily, and break the toy.As far as quality, I think it's pretty good. I ALWAYS supervised my kids <when they were little>, and I always supervise my grand kids when they play with toys. They are 2 and 5 -- not old enough for me to just say - go play, and stay out of sight. Because this Top doesn't physically spin, the kids can either hold it in their hands and watch it,, or put it on the floor or a table to watch it.If you want a Top that you have to physically spin and it spins all over the place- this isn't for you. I myself wouldn't give this to anyone under 5, but it's up to you to give it to someone younger. If you supervise your child playing with this, I really don't see any problem.As with all toys, they will eventually break due to longevity or misuse, so to spend $6.50 on this <I have Prime so no shipping> isn't going to break my bank account!For me- it's worth the money, and I know my granddaughter is going to love this!

These little K Cups are great. I love that I don't have to make a big pot of coffee that won't get finished. The selection of Coffee is super too...from dark to regular to flavored.I got a coupon from the company and was able to go to their website and order any kind of K Cups that I wanted...I made my own "Singles' Box, and the price was pretty good and I got to pick the flavors I wanted to try. You can buy singles or boxes.All in all, this was a good purchase that was shipped very fast, and I'd recommend!

I LOVE English Toffee Coffee, so it was a no brainer that I give The Coffee Fool a try!This coffee is strong that has a great taste. I actually scoop the coffee into my little K Cup and make it in my Keurig, and it's delicious. I like that the bag is resealable and a heavy plastic to keep it fresh.I will definitely be buying more - I LOVE it! Thank you!

This has got to be the SOFTEST fabric I've ever felt. Seriously.I kind of thought that Microfiber would be like those kitchen towels that are fairly thick and are supposed to absorb...but this Duvet Cover is like a VERY thin Cotton that is the softest material I've ever felt.I got it because it's really pretty and came at a great price, and I was going to use over a comforter that got a little bleach damage in the wash. But now...I'm going to use it on a new comforter and use it on a regular basis.I wish someone would make blankets feel like this!! It feels so good against the skin. It makes you feel cool in the summer. I live in Texas where it is STILL 98 degrees out right now -October 7th... COME ON Mother Nature give us a break!I bought a Queen size in the Purple for our Master Guest Bedroom, but just bought the King size in Teal for our Master Bedroom.  I love that the Purple has purple, black and tan colors n white because you can get purple, black, tan or white color sheet sets, and the same with the King size <different colors obviously>, AND if you want - you can actually use BOTH sides of the Cover. The print you see in the photo is the side you'd use most often, but if you look closely at the BOTTOM photo <which is actually the Cover> you will see a little piece of fabric folded over the center of the cover, and that is what the other side of the Duvet looks like....a kind of "skeleton" design if you will. I think it's pretty cool! The buttons at the end of the Duvet would allow you t use ether side, so I like that.All in all, this is a beautiful cover at an excellent price, and the softest material I've ever touched! I definitely recommend it!

I knew this would be big, but boy is it ever huge!It went together fairly easy. I didn't need any tools. For something as large as this, I kind of expected something a little more sturdy.I put it together in my living room. BIG mistake! I didn't have any problems moving to to our bedroom, but once there I thought I could start filling t and then put it in place. Wrong. Once I put some items in it, I tried moving it and the poles kept coming out.What a royal pain in the fanny. It's all my fault really. I should have put it together in the place I was going to put it. It really isn't sturdy enough to put together then move.That being said, once it was together and in it's final resting place, and I loaded it up with sweaters and other clothes items I wanted protected, it is holding everything quite nicely. No issues of bending poles due to heavy weight...and there is about 50 sweaters and sweatshirts and jackets hanging on the left. On the right is 2 hanging closet organizers full of blankets, towels and such. All 3 are pretty heavy, and again - no strain at all.I love the cloth cover as it will keep everything clean,but it is a thin cover so be careful not to pull on it as it may rip if handled too roughly. In my opinion anyways!I don't know if I can add a photo but I will try.If you're looking for an organizer for your closet, or need extra storage, or don't have a closet - this is perfect! Worth the money, IMO. I'd recommend it!

I got these for my sisters wedding. We have some really awesome vases that are quite large so instead of filling with crystals or rocks, we decided to use these and some small LED lights that are waterproof. She just put 10 of these in some water and she couldn't believe how big they got. She loves them, and that makes me happy!A happy bride is ALWAYS a good thing!!Seller shipped really fast. I definitely recommend to anyone...even just for something fun with the kids! Fill your vases up with them and add flowers - that looks amazing!!

I  have ordered this body wash many times now and I absolutely love it. It smells great, you get a ton of lather with just a small amount, and it lasts forever. My skin feels clean and smells great and is so soft. I LOVE this stuff! I can use this entire 16 ounce bottle over a 2 month period. That is AWESOME!DEFINITELY recommend!

I have to comment on this seller. I ordered these because I liked the colors. After a few days I came back to check on shipping and found out this was shipping from China. Not a huge deal for me, but instead of getting them within a week or 2...I was looking at a month. WRONG!!! I got these head wraps 10 DAYS after ordering! WOW I'm impressed!I got exactly the same wraps that were in the photo. I already have a few of these and absolutely LOVE them. They are super light weight and they are PERFECT under our helmets when we get on the Harley. But I also wear one when I'm cleaning or doing yard work. They are light enough to let your head breathe, unlike cotton. Any sweating goes right to the wrap but dissipates very fast. My head doesn't get sunburned at all and it protects my hair.I will absolutely order more from this seller. You cannot beat the price anywhere, and who can complain about the super fast shipping! I definitely recommend!! Thank you!

I've been using a B.E.Kabuki for years and I've kept it clean and in great condition, but it is quote harsh on my skin. The bristles are not soft at all, so I went looking for another.I've purchased items from E.L.F. before, but only makeup items, I didn't know they had tools. SO I saw this one and wanted to try it out.This is probably the softest Kabuki Brush I've ever felt, Seriously. It feels amazing on my skin. And the price? Are you kidding me? I spent $40 on my other Kabuki brushes, so this is a STEAL!Well made, great price. Works great with Mineral Powder makeup. Not for liquids tho!! It fits nicely in my hand and applies my powders amazingly.HIGHLY Recommend! I wouldn't hesitate for a second to purchase another one if mine gets yukky!

I purchased one from another merchant and fell in love with it so when I saw it on Amazon I  had to get another!What I love is that you just put this in the sun light and it powers the light for evening/night use. You can use it outside on your patio or inside. I love it on my pation as the light shines through and the colors of the tiles show up on my floor.Very pretty Light - I'd buy more in different colors if I see them!

I LOVE this little coin purse!It's brightly colored so it's very easy to find in my"suitcase" of a bag! It's well made, the clasp is strong enough that it stays shut but not so strong you have trouble opening it. But what I really like is that you can clean this easily! Getting rumbled around in a purse can get it dirty quick, but it wipes up with a damp cloth quickly.The price is right and it was shipped very fast!The size is a bit larger then I thought it would be, but it's definitely not a deal breaker.I'd recommend this!

I have a ton of birds come to  my back yard to feed, and I have 10 feeders all over the place, this one makes 11. I wanted a feeder that would feed the small birds I have, so bought this one.It's very well made. All steel, even the mesh. The top comes off without problem and is easy to fill.It usually take the birds that come to eat a few days to get used to a new feeder. It's been 3-4 days and not one bird has taken to this feeder yet. I've used Nyjer food and regular songbird food, and none of the birds have gone to it.I'll keep it up and continue to watch and see if they start going to this feeder. I'll update later.

The jury is out with regards to these bird feeders.I love that these are well made of steel, and they're brightly colored. I like that they come with their own chain and hook ready to hang. And the twist off lids work easily enough and is strong.My only issue is the bird food doesn't stay in the feeders. It hasn't mattered what kind of food I put in these <sunflower, Nyjer, or regular food> it comes out very easily. I have to hold this feeder VERY still once I get food in it and take it to hang or else I always have a trail of food behind me.The birds seem to like it because even though there's no perch, the mesh gives them lots of places for their feet to hang on to it while eating. It took the birds 2 days to figure out it is a bird feeder, and the birds that come to my yard are definitely keeping bird food companies in business, but they only seem to go to this feeder once all the other 10 feeders are empty.I'll continue to feed the birds with this feeder, but it they continue to only use it once all the other feeders are empty...I'll just use these as hanging candle holders, as a votive will fit nicely in them.I'll update in about a month.

I love to feed the birds and have 11 feeders hanging all over our back yard. When I saw this 3 level feeder I wanted it right away. I have a lot of the traditional feeders but not a platform feeder.This 3 platform feeder is well made of hard plastic and steel hanger. I put it outside as soon as I took it out of the box.As i hung it on my Shepherds Hook and started to fill it with bird food, I noticed how the platforms didn't stretch much at all. And this is the reason for my giving this 4 stars. With bird food on each platform, it doesn't stretch enough for birds to comfortably eat.The top platform is big enough so that 2 birds can fit on it and eat, but any more then that and they would fight for room.The 2nd platform is harder for birds to get to. They actually have to duck to be able to eat. I've had quite a few birds go to this feeder and they don't seem to have a problem ducking and walking completely under the platform and eat. The bottom platform is pretty much the same as the 2nd - birds have to crawl underneath to feed.I have had this feeder up for 4 days now and the birds really seem to like it because I can't get bird food on it fast enough. I only wish the platforms were farther apart to accomodate the birds so they didn't have to duck under the platform above them.One CON - the Squirrels absolutely LOVE this feeder. There's no way to prevent them from getting the food either. Squirrels can climb just about anything.All in all, the birds seem to love this feeder so I'm happy with that. We'll see if they continue to go to it to eat!

I have a huge wallet I use in my "regular" giant bag, but was looking for a wallet I could use in my Cross Body Bag that I use when my husband and I go riding. I want as little in that bag to keep it as flat as possible because number 1- it hangs around my body so i don't want it to be heavy, and, number 2 - when I ride the Harley, I need my hands free.I ordered the Dragon Lily Pink wallet as not only do I love Pink, but it looked like a bright wallet in the photo.I LOVE this wallet!PROS: BRIGHT Pink Color ~ Makes it easy to see/find.  2 Zipper Parts  ~ One side has 11 Slots for Credit/Business Cards, The other side for Cash/Receipts etc.  ID Window  ~ Very easy to put in / take out ID Cards, Easy to see ALL of your ID.  Craftsmanship  ~ Well made, strong zippers, very good stitching <my pink wallet has pink stitching<, REAL Leather!CONS: No place good to put any coins.  You have to fold your paper money to fit it in the wallet.For me, I don't mind that this won't really hold coins as I have a coin "purse" for that. And I truly don't mind having to fold my paper cash. I am only using this wallet in my cross body bag and we don't get the Harley out but maybe 2-3 times a week, so I only put as much cash as we'll need to eat lunch or dinner.This wallet is really a nice wallet. If you want something to put your bills n that won't need folding, you need to look at other larger wallets. This is on a 4 inch wallet.I LOVE that it has so many slot for Credit or business cards. I have 16 cards all together, and some are doubled up - and they fit without any problems at all. No bulging of the zipper and the entire wallet looks great....not over stuffed. It's real leather so I know it will last a long time, provided it's taken good care of!Buxton makes good products, their quality is exceptional. I know some reviews complain of color combinations, but as long as it does what I want it to, I don't really care what color the stitching is!I would absolutely recommend this wallet to anyone! It's great! Seller shipped fast so I'm 100% happy with my purchase!

I ordered Rose Petals from another seller on here and got them pretty quickly. I ordered these on the same day, but never got them. I contacted the seller 3 times and got no reply. I ended up getting a refund from Amazon.I wish I could have put 5 stars for this, and that I had actually gotten them. They were for my sisters wedding so now I have to look elsewhere.I only hope this seller doesn't do to others what they did to me. If these rose petals are anything like the white ones I got, I would have loved them!

I don't usually wear blue eyeshadow, but my sister is getting married and my Maid of Honor dress is a very dark blue, so I wanted to find a dark blue color to try out.I love Loose Mineral Powder make up. It just seems to look better then cake shadows,, and it lasts a lot longer.Seller shipped quite fast. It came in a little pot in a cute little bag.I immediately got out my brushes and mirror so I could try it out. At first, I applied a primer to my eyes so the shadow would stay put as I usually do. Then I applied the shadow with a very small brush and applied as "eyeliner". Then I applied it to the lower part of my lids, and then I did it in the "Smoky" eye look. I like all 3 ways I applied it!The dark indigo blue color is a gorgeous DARK blue that has just a hint of shimmer/sparkle. At the end of the day <or evening> when I went to take off my makeup, the blue color has almost morphed into a very dark charcoal blue. It came off easily when washed using my Dove face soap.I have very bright green eyes, and usually any kind of blue shadow looks horrible on me. But this color blue is so dark it almost looks black. It's a great color!I LOVE this mineral shadow and will definitely come back to get more colors!I highly recommend this shadow, and the seller!

Very pretty Wig. I have very long hair, down to my waist, and I just wanted to get this wig to see if I would like a hairstyle like this one.I also have very blonde hair so I wanted to see if I looked good with darker hair. Both were appealing.The wig is well made and feels very natural when wearing. I would purchase again in blonde or another color.Recommend!

I was looking for a wallet for my husband and had purchased one a week prior to this one, but he doesn't like it. Found this wallet and decided to order it for him.We live in Texas so the design is perfect!My husband loves this long type of wallet. I've gotten him wallets similar to this from other stores <Cavenders,Montana Silversmith> for almost 25 years. In all of these years, I've never seen any with Texas Designs like this seller has for sale. I wanted to buy all of them!The design of this wallet is just beautiful. The construction is extremely well made. And the price is GREAT! The wallets I've been getting him from the the merchants have cost us well over $50.00.DO NOT HESITATE TO PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER!!!  Awesome products at great prices that ship VERY FAST!I highly recommend and will be getting another wallet just in case ho looses this one!!

I saw a review of this smelling like Mildew, so was hesitant to buy it.SOOOOO Glad I bought this bag - It's AWESOME!!So it smells like leather..if it didn't have the leather scent I would not have believed it to be real leather.That being said, the smell of new leather is strong. IT GOES AWAY. ALL REAL LEATHER HAS A STRONG SMELL WHEN YOU FIRST GET IT.I got my bag 3 days ago and once I put everything in it that I wanted, I put it on the table next to my couch. By the next day, the strong leather scent was gone.I would never, ever put leather in a washing machine..the leather would be ruined. Any Leather I have ever owned, <and I have a lot>, I've ALWAYS taken to be Dry Cleaned. Leather gets destroyed with regular water and soap.I LOVE this bag. It has 6 - YES - SIX compartments for you to put your things in.1. In the front of the bag there is a small zipper compartment that opens up to reveal a window pocket for ID's and 3 pockets for Credit or Business Cards. I put my credit cards in those RFID Sleeves to protect them, and all my cards are in 3, and they fit perfectly! My Driver's License, Military ID and a Medical Card fit perfectly in the ID Window.2. On top of that compartment is another zipper that opens up to a full open compartment. I put a metal tin of Mentos Candies and a small LED flashlight, with plenty of room for more!3. Above that is yet another zipper compartment with more room then I know what to do with!! I put a pen, my inhaler and a few small items in this one. <My hand all the way to my wrist, fits inside this one!>4. On the back of the bag, there is an opening that my IPhone 4s fits into perfectly, or you could put cigarettes if you smoke.5. Above that opening <no zipper> is a zipper compartment that fits my cell phone as well <I use this one for my cell so when I'm on the Harley I won't worry about it falling out>, but you could put anything in it really..6. On the top of the bag is yet another zipper compartment, the main one. It's the entire length and width of the bag. I have a small cosmetic bag and a small coin purse that holds everything I need it to hold.I like using cosmetic bags / coin purses or similar items in bags like this so nothing will stain / rip / ruin the interior. If I were to put everything in the main pocket, it would be hard to find what I'm looking for, so I just use little bags, and I know exactly where everything is! Simple really.This "Small" Cross body bag is holding a TON of my things and you would NEVER know it has so much in it by looking at it. It's not bulged out and none of the seams are stretched.  This is a VERY WELL MADE bag with TONS of organization opportunities!Don't like the smell of leather and can't be patient enough to give it time to breathe, well that's a shame because this really is a great bag at a great price!Priced well for being a genuine leather hand bag that you can wear across your body, or put on your shoulder as the shoulder strap is very adjustable!I recommend it and if I ever want or need anther - I'd come right back here to get one! VERY happy with my purchase!

I got this to put in my purse to put coins in, but when I got it. I saw that it was bigger then I thought it would be, so decided to use it for something else at first.I have a leather cross body bag that I use whenever we ride the Harley. It has 5 zipper compartments and I could put everything I need for short distance rides. It's not as big as my regular suitcase <LOL> but I want my keys, some kind of wallet, a small bag for lip gloss and small perfume, or whatever I want.My biggest issue with this small cross body bags is they're thin, and I have quite a few keys on my chain, and I always end up getting poked by my keys.This little Coin Purse is PERFECT for holding all of my keys!! So that's what I'll use this for.It will definitely hold coins if you use it for that purpose...it's made very well, the canvas is qute sturdy, and the zipper is a good, strong one. You'll save a lot of money in coins in this little bag...it's about 4 inches long by around 3 inches tall and 1 inch thick...it will definitely hold a load of coins.The price is right, the pink color I got is very pretty, and it's made well. What's not to like?I recommend it!

My husband purchased me something almost exactly like this fro Harley. My hair is extremely long, to me waist, so keeping it together while riding is important. I HATE brushing the horrible knots out when we get home.I can either put my hair in a ponytail or just leave it down. It goes over my head just fine. It does stretch a little when doing that, but it doesn't make it too big to stay on my head.It's lightweight, very comfortable, and SO pretty! My helmet has pink flames on it, so this color goes well. Not to mention it's VERY bright so everyone will see the pink!There's no seams in it which is nice..no seam marks on my head or face. You can also put your hair in a bun and put this on and then tie a knot at the end so none of your hair falls out of it. Sometimes I wear it when I'm gardening or mowing the yard, or if it's just plain hot out and  want my hair up so I'm cooler. It really is perfect!I LOVE THIS! I just bought the dark blue too. I want it in all different colors!!

I was VERY leery of these shades because I have never purchased a "Paper Shade" in my life, and wasn't sure that paper would be strong enough. After reading reviews I decided to give them a try.I ordered 3M Scotch Heavy Duty Mounting Tape, 1-Inch by 50-Inch with the shades because I wanted to be sure they stuck.I was able to cut them down to the ODD sizes I needed. My dining room has 4 windows - 2 in the center are considerably larger then the ones on each side of the 2 bigger ones. I was able to cut one shade in half and use those 2 pieces in each side window, and I was able to cut off about 4 inches of 2 more to fit the center windows.These were simple to install. Measure your window, cut with either sharp scissors or an Exacto knife.Pull off the strip covering the sticky strip <I did that and then added the 3M Double Sided Tape>, then simply put them up. These curtains, all 6 of them, come with clips that you put on the bottom of the shade to pull up and down the shade, without touching the paper. It took me an hour to put all 4 shades up, and I'm 100% Disabled so I don't usually do this stuff. But I was excited to see them up and didn't want to wait for my husband to come home from work to do it.I am actually pretty impressed with these shades. They look Amazing! You'd never know they are paper unless you get right up to them and feel them. They are definitely a high quality paper. I had these ugly, ugly plastic mini blinds that I paid a fortune for since they were such odd sizes, and these Paper Shades look like I spent even more!They aren't light "Blocking", but they do filter it. I have more light now then I did with the plastic mini blinds. It's a really nice "glow" light. I like that there's no string/handles, they're cordless. They provide complete privacy <nobody can see in or out> while not blocking out the light.What I like best though is No. 1 - the price is perfect! Where can you get 6 shades for under $40??? And No.2 - I can do this myself! And quickly! AND with no help from anyone. And for someone like myself who has to count on someone to help with almost everything - that's pretty awesome to me!Definitely give these a try!

We took out the Sliding Glass Door that was in our living room and put in a beautiful Double Glass door that on the right side is just a giant window with mini blinds inside the panes of glass, and the left side is the same except it opens. The mini blinds look really nice, but I still wanted a curtain that would block out the light. Not ot mention our electric bill has been between $300- $400. <We have a 3900 sq. ft. home with LOTS of windows and doors>I wanted curtains that could block out most of the light, but more importantly - keep the heat out. I live n Texas and no matter where you are in my house, the heat just seeps in - no matter how good your windows are. If the sunlight can get in - it's HOT!I liked that it said these blocked light plus helps to reduce noise.My Black curtains were not wrinkled as much as others have said in their reviews. They come folded and in a plastic zipper bag. I unfolded the curtain and just hung them, and they looked great. No wrinkle problems at all. The Chocolate curtains were a little wrinkled but all I had to do was put them in my dryer with  a fabric softener sheet <I use Arm & Hammer Total, 2-in-1 Moist Dryer Cloths, Classic Fresh 40 Ct (Pack of 4) you can buy on Amazon> and leave it in for 3-5 minutes and they're perfect.Both of these curtains block out almost all of the light. Each side lets a little in, but what do you expect with a curtain?If you want 100% light block, then you'll need to tape them to the wall.As far as noise reduction, it is considerably less noisy now that I have these curtains up. I put the Black in our large living room and the Chocolate in the formal living room. We have lots of teens who drive with their stereos blaring and thumping at all hours of the day and night, and now the only thing we hear, or feel actually, is the base, and nothing is going to get rid of that.But the most impressive thing to me is that since I put these curtains up, our electric bill has gone from between $300-$400 - to $260 <the 1sy electric bill since the new curtains>. That's a BIG win in my book!I get Migraines a lot, more then anyone should, and now that the light and noise is so reduced - it takes less time for me to get rid of the migraines then before. <I need it very quiet and very dark>These curtains feel amazing. They weigh less then 2 pounds. You can add a swag or have Lace tops to "decorate", or leave them just as they are as they certainly aren't ugly! They're simple to hang....and the price is perfect!If you are looking for a pretty curtain that blocks MOST of the light and reduces the noise - THESE are the ones for you. Just be sure to order TWO because there's only 1 panel in each order!! I got the 95 inch curtains as my door is ceiling to floor - and they fit PERFECTLY. There is a half of an inch on top and on bottom that the curtain doesn't cover. Be sure to measure your windows or doors!I'm getting another set to put in our bedroom. I definitely recommend!

Hands down the BEST brush I've ever used. Honestly.I am 50 years old and my husband and I get on the Harley at least 2-3 times a week. I have extremely long hair - down to my waist, and occasionally I like to ride without my helmet. I live in Texas and in the summer, the heat is just so unbearable & I hate  putting on my heavy helmet, so I go with a Bandana. Unfortunately, my hair gets such horrible knots and tangles in it, that when I brush my hair, I always come away with not just a massive ball of hair that my other brush pulls out of my head, but a nasty headache to go with it.I saw this brush while looking for another product and even though I have about 20 different brushes - I got it to try out. I am VERY HAPPY I did! I opened it up and used it right away. I hadn't been on the bike so I just brushed my normally wavy/curly, thick long hair. I felt like I was in a Spa getting a head massage! It felt THAT good! We did take a ride the next day and I wore just a bandana, no ponytail, as I wanted my hair to get all kinds of knots in it. It did get a lot of knots.I used the brush on my knotty hair and let me say this. I didn't feel one tug, there was no pulling, and when I was done brushing my hair, there was only a very small amount of hair in the brush. Compared to the huge ball I had been getting every single time with my other brushes - this amount is nothing. And even better - no headache! I also notice no static electricity in my hair - which is normal for me here in Texas.I. Am. Thrilled!  This brush is AMAZING. The way it is made is great...it holds nicely in your hand - very comfortable. The bristles are very firm. It's very easy to clean the brush after each use, whether you just pull the hair out or you put it in the sink to get a good clean brush...either way it's simple to do.I was able to get rid of 17 other brushes!! The ONLY problem now is when my husband saw the brush, he actually got excited. He has a brush similar to this one a long time ago and lost it. SO when he saw my new pink Crave brush - HE TOOK IT. He actually took it, used it, smiled at me, and I had to give it to him. So now I need to get one for myself.I have a granddaughter who is 5 with the most gorgeous, thick and curly hair you'll ever see and she's very tender headed. I can't wait to try this on her!!I am 100% thrilled with my purchase. The seller shipped it SUPER fast. And I LOVE this brush, as does my husband. The price may seem like a little pricey but honestly - I'd pay more for it - it's THAT good.THANK YOU Crave Naturals for making such a great brush!

In case you don't know the basic plot for ANTICHRIST, here's a quick synopsis.  One wintery, snowy day, husband and wife HE (Willem Dafoe) and She (Charlotte Gainsbourgh) are making love, and hence don't notice that their young toddler has escaped his crib and climbs onto a table to look out their upper apartment window...only to slip and fall to his death.  Needless to say, this is a devastating event.  He (a therapist) decides the deeply depressed She needs to get away and he takes her to their cabin in the woods for some homegrown therapy.  Strange events and madness ensue.I don't think I've spoiled much, because I've only touched on the first few minutes and haven't even tried to explain what watching this film is really like.  It's tough to review such a controversial and confrontational film, but let me try in 3 ways.1)  As a story, the film is a bit of a failure.  The subject is immediately gripping, but the film doesn't really prove to be much about what happens as what is experienced.  The couple head to the woods and a series of events...perhaps supernatural, perhaps merely madness manifesting take place, resulting in the couple coming to a pretty severe crossroads in their relationship.  There is essentially no reason to see the film just to see how the story plays out.  There is, indeed, some graphic nudity and sex, but trust me...it is not enticing.  (Hell, by the end, it's quite off-putting!)2)  Deeper meanings.  Here's where director and proficient provacateur Lars von Trier really really goes to work.  On the simplest level, the film could be about madness brought on by grief.  She is barely able to put one foot in front of the other because of grief, guilt and fear.  He either doesn't feel much grief, or puts on this therapist hat so that he can deal with his wife and not face the grief himself.  Either way, his seeming lack of empathy doesn't help She feel better, and her animosity towards her husband grows.  Everyone grieves in their own way, and when a couple isn't on the same page in how their grieve, the marriage is damaged or destroyed.  But this, to me, is only the surface lesson.The film also seems to suggest that She is possibly evil.  Prior to the calamity, She  had been working on a thesis about how women have been portrayed as evil or Satanistic through the centuries.  She worked while in the cabin for a getaway with her son (HE did not come along, tellingly).
