The glasses arrived quickly and came with the silicone ice ball included, nice set and they seemed protected from scratches and such since there wasn't any apparent marks on the glass. The size is great and perfect for a whiskey drink, as well as the shape being curved inward at the top so rolling whiskey is a lot easier. Spills are prevented without making it harder to drink from.The glass is nice, thick enough that I dont think they would break easily and its really smooth, no dings. The ice ball is very cool and easy to set up. The top has a little hole that is filled with water after the two pieces are connected. Once full, goes into the freezer and a few hours later a large ball of ice is done.Awesome thing about the ice balls is that they fit into the whiskey glasses perfectly. Since they're large they dont melt as fast and keeps drinks cooler for a lot longer. I think its a great idea to have the set together!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Comfortable socks, the sizing seems great and they fit as they should. I usually wear a size 7 and they arent snug but they dont hang much over my toes either so there is a good amount of room for me.The pack comes with 12 pairs and all of them are a different color. For the current price and the amount received I think its a good deal. They are a bit thick so I am going to be wearing these during the winter. Although they feel like a nice thickness, the socks are still breathable.All of the seams are tight and I have not found any loose threads, washing and drying is fine and they didnt shrink. Most of all, after washing, the super soft material stayed super soft and didnt lose that cozy feel.Great pack of fuzzy socks! Perfect for the cold!I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

These are great! Perfect for crafts and they'll be useful for my next project coming up. I have used a bunch for some jewelry hangers I made and still have plenty left so the 100 pack is nice to have, the current cost for the huge bunch is a good deal as well.They were a little smaller than I expected but still a great size to use for the jewelry hanger. I took about 5 of them and also used a wooden clothes hanger and screwed them into the bottom of the hanger. After they were in, I just hung it up and put necklaces and earrings on the hooks. It looks really pretty and works fantastically.For my next project I am going to take some little glass bottles that have corks in the top and screw the screw eyes into the top of the cork. In the bottle will be cute sea shells.Point being, I have a lot of ideas that came from getting these cool screw eyes and there are plenty more to come. The looped part on the screws is just about closed, there is a tiny area that could be tightened to ensure a closure though and its done easily. If I wanted to open it more (which I did with the hanger project) then its easy to pull it open a bit more so hanging from them can be done. The metal is strong and sturdy but easy to work with and the length of the screw part seems to be long enough to stay durable in whatever, wood, plastic, cork, etc. I have a lot left but I will definitely get more of these when the time comes.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I ordered two of these since each order only comes with one panel, so if you need more than one for a window you'll need two. They arrived in great shape, folded up onto a hanger so they looked presentable. Since they were folded, there was creases on some parts but after hanging for a few days those creases ended up just flattening out themselves without an iron needed.Based on the color I got which was the green, I thought they would be a bit less blackout than say black, but they are wonderful. I am looking at them now in the middle of the daytime and there is no light shining through the curtains whatsoever so they block out anything fantastically. Most blackout curtains are thick and bulky, too heavy, etc but these are nice and light without that extra bulk. The material is flowy and silky soft but with a matte color, no shine. They look great hanging up in my living room.The window I have them covering right now is about 90 inches wide and the two curtain panels cover it well. The length of the panels is very long so that was no problem. Ellington Home Solid Thermal Blackout panels are great and I would definitely order again.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Getting the screen protector on was a simple process and it did come with some instructions to follow along with a wet wipe, a dust remover, and a micro fiber cloth for preparation and removing all the little particles before hand. It fits evenly and properly over my screen, although I can tell its there since its not extremely thin. Not a major issue, but I did have to get used to the feel.My stylus works fine with the protector, it doesnt have an effect on sensing my fingertips or the stylus and works as though nothing is there. Protector seems to be really strong, preventing any scratches which is what I wanted it for since my son likes to play with my phone all the time. I have not had a new scratch since applying.If the screen protector were to break then it would be a bit safer than not having it because it would just shatter itself into a bunch of tiny pieces instead of my screen breaking into sharp pieces of glass. Its doing its job, I would order again.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

1:53 Mins One thing I forgot to mention in the video is that the duvet cover has the Slothzilla on BOTH sides, so thats great. It arrived packed all nice and tight into its plastic bag and only had some wrinkles on the places where it was folded. After washing and drying the wrinkles were gone. I didn't notice any major shrinkage from the dryer since it fit just the same. It seems pretty true to size and has a great length so there is a little hang over on the end of my bed. The bottom of the cover has the zipper which does not go from end to end, its more so in the middle so getting the duvet in was like putting it into a pillowcase. Took only a minute or two.Since its made out of 100% cotton, it is super soft. That makes for a really good nights sleep without being too hot. You seriously just have to feel it, its so nice. The printing quality done on the cover is excellent, clear picture and amazing artwork, all even so that the picture is centered. Sharp Shirter did an awesome job on this. I would definitely order again and probably will be getting a new print soon!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I've been needing one of these for some time now, since I got my desktop and the numbers are just so awkward with placement on the keyboard. Being as I used to be a call representative doing the billing for a major company I had to use a numeric keypad often. So I got this one and I am really satisfied with it, all of the keys work properly and it works well.It arrived quickly which was nice and packed in a tough plastic container, one of those that seems never ending when trying to open and 100% requires scissors..It had the keypad and the little USB nano receiver included. It does take a battery but that was included, a AAA, so I loved that because not often now do I see things with the batteries in the package already. Installing was simple. Nano receiver went into the back of my desktop. TIP** To turn the pad on and off you need to push the NUM LOCK key, which is sometimes hard to remember.I tested the keypad out on a word document which it did well. All of the keys pressed smoothly. Nothing stuck. The surface of the keys is nice and has a soft feel. The underside has rubber feet so it doesnt slide around on my desk. I really liked the tilt it has so it feels more natural to rest upon it when using, tilted upward away from me. Kmashi did great with this one, I would recommend it.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I wont go a day without having a screen protector put on my phone, which has definitely helped tremendously for the time I have had it on there so I got this one for a friend who thought her case was doing the job fine but could use more protection against scratches on the screen.The protector is made from a high strength and tough built tempered glass which is a lot better and more resistant to breakage than normal glass because of the chemical or thermal process and safer if it does break since it will shatter in to a ton of tiny fragments that wont have sharp edges (unlike a phone screen which will). So its a tough cookie. I bent it around and tested it out a bit before applying to the phone and it held up nicely. The corners are all rounded and fit well against the edges of the screen so there was not any overlapping.Applying it was easy and the pack came with some tools to make that so. An alcohol pad to wipe clean the screen before hand, a dust remover because of all the little particles that might be missed and so there wont be an irritating little piece in there after the protector is on, and a microfiber cloth which is nice and removes fingerprints and dirt after too. The instructions were easy to follow so I had no trouble and since it fit well, it has stayed put through the week without issues. Using the touchscreen has been no different, the only thing I can say about it is that I definitely know its there. Its not like a super thin piece of glass so I can feel the difference from before. I would surely get this brand again if necessary though.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I was able to do a few different vases with the one order of these gel beads. They look really cool and add a bit of something nice to look at other than just water so they're pretty appealing to the eye. For the current cost, the amount I got is great. When they arrive they're in a clear plastic bag, very lightweight, and completely clear. There was definitely thousands upon thousands of those little beads in the package, probably about a mm in size when dry.The easiest way I found to use them was to just fill the water up in the vase with them inside instead of trying to transfer afterwards because they become extremely slippery and about 1/4-1/3 inch size when fully absorbed. Just dont over fill. It takes about 8 hours but starts to have some growth after an hour or two.Its been a week and they have not had any problems like mold or any scent, the color has stayed as clear as they were when they arrived. After a few days they started to feel a little less moist than before so adding a bit of water helped and plumped them up so I would recommend adding water twice a week to prevent them from shrinking back up. My roses were not harmed in the vase of beads and seemed to act as though it was just in water so apparently these do not effect plants which is great. I think they would be awesome as a wedding centerpiece or to add to decor. Id love to mix some colors and see the result!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Beautiful! I love this bag for my monthly overnight trips that I take with my son and its large enough to fit both of our necessary belongings without feeling overly bulky. The leather canvas is modern and looks great with all of the brass pieces on the straps. On the bottom there is a thin strip of leather that matches the straps as well so the design is really unique.The inside is amazing, with the super pretty lining and so many pockets! Multiple zippered pockets and large compartments so the storage area is wide and plentiful. My laptop fits inside along with our clothing and necessity's, my sons toys, some snacks, diapers, etc. The front has a zippered area as well and the reverse side has a vertical pocket that is perfect for money and phones. All of the zippers are easily pulled, no problems getting caught or pulled off of the track. On the bag are the straps which also work instead of being strictly for looks. They can be tightened and adjusted as well as the shoulder strap included. The shoulder strap does come off so it can be used as either, holding the handles or not, and its comfortable being thick.All of the bits and pieces attached to the bag give an amazing cosmetic appeal but also have a lot of function. Since the bag is so well made and extremely well built it will last a long time and through a lot of wear and tear through the years. Its seams are all nice and tight, constructed so well and evenly. I can tell a lot of hard work went into crafting the bag and for the amount of use and functionality it will give, it deserves 5 stars and more.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

The cat decals arrived quick and in good condition, there was one minor flaw which was the bend in the paper backing and vinyl of one cat but once stuck on the window its hardly noticeable. They are a bit small but with the glow in the dark feature, they stand out wonderfully. All of the cats are rolled up and come off of the backing easily and are placed onto any surface nicely. I have mine on the window without any air bubbles or problems with the sticking.At first they do not glow but seem to need a charge to get them going. To do this I just held it up to a bright light for about 2 minutes and then when its dark they glowed fantastically. So now that they are already placed, I will use a flashlight to "charge" whenever needed.Each individual cat decal is different from the next so the variety included is nice. I think these are going to be perfect for Halloween coming up to go along with all the other decor!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I actually do not have a recliner. I have a sofa that has a middle console where the remotes and magazines are placed with a couple cup holders in the center so its really hard to find a protector for it with the odd shape it has. I figured I would try this since my sofa if cut in half would be similar to a recliner and have the arms. Well, it worked! It worked really well. I placed the protector over one side of the sofa and the arm cover parts lay perfectly, one on the arm and the other on the middle console area. The top of the protector covered nicely as did the bottom.With spills and such I think its great, I have not had any issues with stains. The material is thicker than I thought it would be so it does have a comfortable feel on top of the couch. The straps keep it on so it doesn't budge when my son is jumping around on it. Also, since its reversible we are able to use either side to change it up whenever which is nice. I plan on getting another one of these for the other side since it worked out so well. Thick, durable construction with tightly sewn seams so it will definitely last a long time.I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Miss Piggy really has it going on. She is a lot larger than I thought she'd be at a true 19 inches tall and with her natural pig curves of course. Stunning to say the least.The plush is adorable, the details are wonderful, and the hair is pretty realistic for a plush stuffed doll. Imagine a huge barbie filled with cotton. I love that the dress is velour, its really pretty. Miss Piggy has makeup on, jewelry, even high heels which is super cute.I did notice that when I took the plush out of the package the hair was a bit frazzled and could use a combing but that was easily fixed. The seams are all nicely done and tight so a child with the toy wont be a problem or be ruined quickly.Its a great addition to a Muppets collection or a child who loves her!I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

These are great, for the right person. If you are like me, a little craft challenged, then maybe go with another option or have a friend do them for you because they can be confusing to put together. The instructions are okay but I would have rather saw some illustrations with more detailed info on how to make them.They pom pom balls come in a bag and are all flattened. After trying a few times and failing I finally figured it out. The string that is tied around the middle of the flat paper needs to stay tied around the paper, then one by one, take each piece and pull outward until all of them are pulled out. After that, adjust as needed to fill in the empty spots and to make it look like a pom pom.Note- you have to be careful to pull the paper outward because its very thin and will tear easily.The balls end up being from 5" to 11" and are really lightweight. They will hang easily without any issues. Since the pack I got only came with 5 of the pom poms I was a bit disappointed since it was difficult to figure out the first couple. After messing up the first ones its hard to make them work as the paper gets wrinkly and torn. If you know what you are doing then they are awesome though so I would recommend a crafty friend to go along with them!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Its been a long time since I purchased CoverGirl eye makeup but I really needed a dark shadow quick and cheap so this is the chosen one. Im satisfied more so than I thought I would be with it and the vibrancy of it is impressive. I think that this brand has came a long way and improved a lot since the last time I used it over 5 years ago. This one is called Shimmering Onyx, although I dont see much shimmer when applied, its dark and smooth. Blending is easy, I recommend using a blending brush and not the one included. For the current cost of the shadow its worth it. The eyeshadow compact piece is pretty thick so it will last a really long time. Most of all, it lasts enough time. I did not expect it to last all day of course, but it lasts through work fine without having that annoying creasing effect. I tried it out with a shadow primer and it gave about an hour extra in lasting time. For what its worth, I would definitely get this shadow again and have already got a couple more shades.

The fit of the slippers on myself is excellent. I usually wear a size 7 in shoes but got these in a 38 which is about a 7.5 in US sizing, they fit great. Not too big or too small. Even the width is fine, not squeezing the sides of my feet or anything but a comfortable fit where I wont slip out.They have some great padding on all sides and the bottom is wonderfully cushioned. I can walk outside to the mailbox without feeling the rigid hard ground underneath although they are for indoors. On the plus side as well is the bottom which has a rubber sole with some texture that keeps me from slipping and sliding all over the hardwood floors. Even if I tried to slide I couldn't with the grip it has.I am in love with the super soft cotton and polyester blend material on the slippers. Just incredibly comfy and feels amazing to slip into after a long day, such a soft smooth fluff all around. I am going to get a couple more pairs as gifts for the holidays this year.I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I am really surprised at the vivid and bright color produced by these. Of course everyone knows that Crayola has always been one of, if not the best, brands of crayons and the most quality produced so I knew what to expect but these ones still blew me away. I dont know if its a different formula of crayon wax or a change in production but they do feel a little different. The crayons are a lot smoother and seems a little softer when touching the tips. When put onto paper the crayons do not have to have much pressure to notice a lot of the color transfers so much easier.  I am impressed to say the least.The box is standard with 24 colors. The pack comes with 3 boxes though so its definitely worth it. I have put away the other 2 boxes after giving my son one to start with and the one box is lasting fine. I have not noticed any issues with the quality whatsoever and none of them are breaking due to being cheap.On the box it says they are washable which is great although I do not have issues with my kid drawing on himself to need a crayon washing but since they do feel like a softer wax I can tell they would not be hard to show up on skin. So being washable is a great feature that I have not seen in crayons before.They are wonderful and like always, Crayola has done really well!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

The creativity and imagination that comes from such a simple item is fascinating to witness. Watching my little boy use what he has and explore that creative side is a lot of fun. The Wikki Stix are just made from a strand of standard yarn, about 8" each, and coated in a thick layer of silky hardened wax which makes the stix really pliable and able to adhere to almost anything. I think its a genius idea.I got this party pack that came with 3 packs each with 6 colors (4 stix of each color totaling 24). In the packs there were small instruction sheets with illustrations on them, ideas for kids to start with projects to make. All of the stix were easy to tear from one another and were in great shape when opening. We loved the bright vivid main colors.Overall, the Wikki Stix are just so much fun. My husband made a fish and stuck in on the wall, it has still not moved so the stickiness is amazing! My son has been playing around with them for days, bending them up and then unraveling his creation only to begin on another so they truly are reusable without issues. After each use they can be re flattened simply and its not noticeable that it was used before. I also noticed that the stix do not pick up hair and other stuff in the wax if they were to be played with on the carpet so they look good all the time. I think they would be perfect for a classroom setting and as a teaching tool. Great fun item for the kids!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

D'Eco cosmetic organizers are my absolute favorite! I have many of this brand and every time I get a new one its always the same great quality and craftsmanship I expected it to be.This one has a lot of room. The sizing is large and plenty of drawers to put makeup or jewelry into. Almost 10 inches in length, about 4 inches wide, and almost 6 and 1/2 inches tall. It has two longer drawers on the bottom that fit almost all of my palettes and some compacts. I have some liners and mascaras in the bottom as well. The four smaller sized drawers on the top half are the perfect size for lipsticks, hair ties, clips, and jewelry. Drawers are deeper than I thought they would be at around 1 3/4 - 2".  Its made really well, the organizer does not have a bunch of glued pieces and parts, looks like it was 3D cut along with each of the individual drawers. All the handles are firmly and evenly placed, drawers slide nicely without sticking so its super smooth.I love having the ability to see through it, the acrylic is extremely clear as though it were glass. I dont have to dig around to find the item I need since its visible and organized. I would definitely get another one of these 6 drawer organizers from D'Eco, especially since the top is completely flat so its entirely possible to stack them on one another easily and safely. They're sturdy and durable so it would not be an issue. It would also be hard to damage since the material is so strong and well made.Highly Recommended!! Wonderful organizer!I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I am disappointed in the Home-Complete shoe rack organizer for the reasons stated below.1. Quality of materials- The box comes with the pieces and parts needed to build the shoe rack by hand of course. Eight thin metal poles which are light and hollow and the two black plastic side pieces that the poles are arranged into. The eight poles that are included seem to be somewhat fragile, to where they would bend if a heavier boot is placed on it. With the side pieces, they're just cheap. Thin and easily breakable plastic that will crack after a short time.2. Difficult assembly- After trying four or five times to arrange and assemble the poles into the sides I finally figured out the issue. Out of all the poles, 3 of which were a 1/2 inch shorter than the other 5. With the poles varying in sizes there was not a fully functional way that I could assemble the shoe rack without having a couple poles pop out while I added one more. It was just a circle of frustration. Also, the sides have many spots for the poles to go into, depending on how you want the rack to be, but the holes did not seem tight enough to keep them in and be able to set shoes on.3. Storage area- I was not able to fully complete the assembly of the rack although I did see the spacing in between the poles at the largest and the smallest. At even the largest spacing apart (for larger shoes) it would still not be able to hold large mens work boots. My husband wears a size 13 and they would not have nearly enough room to sit on the rack. The smallest spacing would work for my toddlers shoes.So with these issues, I cannot give much of a good rating. The rack could have potential if the poles issue was corrected and for smaller sized shoes though. I actually am fond of the design and style of it and hope to see one similar with a higher level of durability in the future.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I have built up quite a collection of these acrylic organizers and I love them. This one is so useful since I have hundreds of lippys and liners that need a spot so its quite full now.There are 24 little compartments in the organizer, each of them about one square inch in size. I do want to point out that in the listing it says it can hold nail polish and bottles but honestly it would not unless they are very small. The squares fit lipstick, liners, and brushes fantastically though which is what I think its perfect for. The whole size of it is about 5.75 inches wide, almost 4 deep, and about 3 tall at the highest point (1.75 inches tall at the shortest point). Its angled upward like stairs so every cosmetic item placed in the organizer can be seen easily behind the other.Its really strong in material and construction since its all one solid piece. There are no pieces are parts glued together in a way that it could break, just one laser cut to guarantee durability. When it first got here my son threw it around a few times when I wasn't looking and it doesnt have a scratch on it. Well made and will last a long time. Everything is better when its organized!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

Classic SciFi.  Well acted.  It's story line, though copied since, was an original.  I've watched it many times over, and enjoy it everytime.  If you've seen the later version with Jeff Goldblum, Leonard Nimoy, etc.  you'll understand its opening scenes with Kevin McCarthy yelling "They're here!" while running through the city streets.  It is a nice nod to this original film of the same name.  The newer film takes place after the events of this original.
Great needles for my embroidery machine!
I use this for lots of things: hanging decorations on my deck or fence, organizing cords, etc.  It works great!  I bought different colors so I can organize by color, too.  Love it!

I wanted something I could use, indoors and out, to hold my laundry as I took it out of the washer or dryer.  This one works well, including a couple of places to dry my Skechers and/or slippers.  Seems to be wll made. And it folds up when not in use.

They do keep the door from slamming shut, thus protecting little fingers, and, if placed on the top of the door, closer to the door's far edge, will keep it from slamming on your small animals, too.  So, why only three stars?  They're ugly.  They have Japanese style characters on them, rather than kiddie characters like animals.  So they don't add to your decor at all!  And they look odd.  You also have to be able to reach above the top of the door in order to place them to keep the door from slamming into small bodies, which is my purpose in buying them.  I'm 5'5" and it's hard for me to put them on and take them off because I'm not tall enough to comfortably reach high enough to put them on or take them off.  They're also overpriced, in my opinion.

I opened and installed one.  Yippee, I thought, these will be great.  Then I opened the cyan and a big drop landed on my rug!  The rug is multi colored so it won't really show, so I continued.  I looked at the cartridge and saw it was swimming in ink, and so were my fingers!  I opened a different cyan, it looked fine, and I needed to print, so I continued. Okay, yellow.  Then I opened the big black, and MORE ink all over my hands.  That was it!  I was done digging for bargain cartridges that were staining me, my carpet, and anything else they could spill on!  They are going back, with my fury in tact.  I'm lucky they didn't spill all over the new clothes I was wearing.  And I can't get the ink off my hands!  Gross!  No bargain here, believe me!

This is being sold as a "dress," but it is a top.  It is very flimsy material and only reaches to the bottom of my torso, barely reaching the top of my legs.  I don't know how it received anything BUT one star.  I think you might find this is a dollar store.  Needless to say, it is going back.

The clips are VERY POOERLY MADE.  One the first use, the clip fell apart!  Luckily I could fix it, but it's disappointing.  The suspenders are made of nice stretch material, but the ruin them with such cheap hardware.

I LOVE this thing!  My laundry area is in my bathroom, so these isn't a lot of room to hang clothes as they come out of the dryer.  That led to wrinkling problems.  So, I tried this.  It was easy to assemble and I fit it into a corner with the hangers folded up.  When I need it, I simply pull down the hanger arms and I have PLENTY of room to hang the clothese.  I LOVE it!
I believed the hype and bought this "scary" movie.  I bought the first one, too.  They are both boring!  I love horror, but these were only ho-hum.

This is a great knee support!  It really helps a lot.  I damaged my knees when I started wearing a new pair of Reebox sneakers.  I thought it was a sudden onset of arthritis, but it was the shoes!  DUH!  I could barely walk or get up or down to a chair!  Needless to say, I no longer wear those shoes, but the knee issues persisted.  I tried several different knee braces, but this was the best.  It's bulky, so I only wear it around the house, but, even with that limited use, it got my knee back to nearly normal.  I still use it off and on, as needed.  Love it!  I also will never buy Reebok again!  I reported the problem to them, hoping to save others from the pain I suffered, but they didn't care!
I like this brow makeup.  It works well to highlight the brows and keep them neatly arranged.

The instructions said to turn the bottom a certain number of times to prep the brush.  It took MANY more turns to get the makeup to the brush. Once it WAS primed, it went on easily and worked well to cover dark areas and to highlight.  The next time I used it, I found that the brush had dried and was rather hard.  It still worked, but I didn't like the fact that it had dried out so quickly and hardened the brush.  I wrote to the company to report my experience.  I'm hoping they make improvements.
Very cute and reasonably priced.  Easy to put on.
Very cute, and reasonably priced.  Very easy to apply.

I love these.  They're a great, light weight way to pull in all those unsightly bulges.  The only problem is that the light weight material is rather delicate.  I put my finger through several pair.  I had to cut down my nails.  I wrote to the company reporting that issue, and I'm hoping they find a solution.  I have MANY pairs of these.  And this was the best price of anywhere I shopped!  And, even with the ripping problem, I'll still buy more.

I bought these for my dog's allergy.  I give him half a pill during the high pollen season, and it works great!  I think I'll start using them, too.  These have no antihistamines so there's not drowsy side effects.
These work very well in getting in between teeth for a good cleaning BUT, as a senior with sensitive teeth, using these often sets my tooth pain off.  So I only use them occassionally.
Very cute.  Easy to apply.  Good price.
These work as well as any others I've tried, and for a better price.  I broke one, which was my fault, so I have no complaints.  I'll come back for more when I need them.

This is a terrific series that a lot of people haven't found!  It's put out on the History channel.  I was lucky enough to watch the very first episode and I was hooked.  Great story line, great acting.  LOTS of violence, though.  So, if gore gets to you, you might need to hit the fast forward MANY times.  My brother caught one episode at my home and immediately asked what "movie" it was.  Excellent production quality.  I don't think you'll be disappointed if you get this series.  I love it!

They say southern schools are behind those of the north.  It would seem this movie agrees.  The boy comes home to tell his dad he learned all about ants.  And, that there is only one female in the whole colony!  SO WRONG!  Anyway, I hate movies that make such obvious errors.  I watched the movie on cable and it was okay considering tgat there was nothing else to watch on a Wednesday night just before the TV seasons are changing.

I love PUR filters.  I use them on my faucets and in my bedroom pitcher.  I have a disability that often keeps me in bed, so I have a small refrigerator and electric teapot in my bedroom.  I used to have to come downstairs to get fresh PUR water, but that was too hard for me, so I bought the large pitcher.  Now I get my water from the bathroom faucets and run it through my PUR pitcher.  The water is great and I can have my cup of tea without all that extra effort.

These remind me of the thin plastic bags we used to get at a deli.  They are NOT like the plastic lunch bags from the supermarket from Hefty, etc. but, for my purposes they are fine.  I buy large quantities of meat and deli meats when it is on sale.  I also cut up my own steaks, and roasts by buying an entire beef tenderloin, etc.  I then put them in vacuum sealed bags before freezing them. In order to keep the meats from freezing into big blocks, I put them in separate plastic bags, like theses, before placing them in the vacuum bags.  The bags work rather well for that purpose, and keep the moisture in the meats.  I have now added an additional piece of non stick silicone between them.  Now they never stick together and the meats can be taken out in just the right portions I want.

I'm not really sure HOW to rate a hair brush, but it works fine for me.  I keep it in my handbag for those fix ups you might need during the day.  I like teasing brushes and have several.  They all seem to work fine, BUT, if you are using a blow dryer and a teasing brush, like I do, get natural bristles. The brushes with plastic bristles will soften with the heat and bend out of shape.  At least, that was my experience.

These are small spray bottles and exactly what I needed, though I only needed a couple.  It can't hurt to have some on hand for unexpected needs so the extra bottles are just fine.  If you have a need for small spray bottles these should be just fine.

I paid a small fortune buying these from Excaliber for use in my dehydrator.  I had no idea that I could buy them elsewhere!  Silly me!  When I saw these, they LOOKED the same, so I thought I'd try them.  They are exactly like those I paid a fortune for!  Fantastic!  The only thing I don't like about ANY of them, I'd washing them. They're large and you really need a flat surface to wash them.  Then you need a place to put them to dry.  THAT I dislike a lot.  If someone has a solution to the "washing problem," I'd love to hear it!  The two sets I bought here, I cut into smaller pieces to use between pieces of meat when I vacuum seal and freeze them. I specifically wanted them to freeze cold cuts.  I put the cold cuts into lunch bags, separated with pieces of these mats, vacuum sealed them and put them in the freezer.  Last night I took out a few bags for dinner.  They separated without ANY effort!  Love these things!  So many uses I can think of.  Now, any suggestions for washing them?

I have lots of silicone items in my kitchen, silicone baking pans, silicone utensils, silicone pot holders, silicone funnels, etc.  NONE of them had a bad odor when I got them.  This is the first time I got a silicone kitchen item that SMELLS!  It also has a top piece that looks like it was hand cut to its round shape by a child who couldn't cut well.  It might work, but I don't like it.  It looks like something I'd find in a dollar store.  I'm not sure I'd feel safe using it around food.  I'm sending it back.
First impression: it SMELLS!  So, needless to say it's in the wash.  It had a strong rubber odor to it, just like another that I bought from China.  I'll update the review when/if I get to wear it.
First reaction, it SMELLS!  It has a strong rubber odor.  So, needless to say, it's going in the wash.  I'll ipdate my review when/if it is wearable.
